1143.content:
The jocks name is John he is 16 6"7 Brown hair Brown eyes


He decided to take the remote home to test it.

When he got home he was greeted by his older sister.
She was 22 5"8 With Red hair and blue eyes. Her name was Lynn.

Lynn was quite attractive with her height decent curves and D Cup breasts.

Ever sense their parents died in a freak work accident Lynn became like the head of the household dropping out of college and getting a job to support and care for herself, John and their siblings.


John was the 2nd oldest and technically the man of the of house. Then there were his younger sisters ages
14 8 6 and 4 and his brothers ages 14 and 8

Yes shockingly his family had 2 sets of Twins the 14 year old brother and sister being identical Twins aside from Gender.

"About time you get your ass home John! Your boss called and said you skipped work. Listen brat just cause our parents government job gives us a stipend and a small bit of compensation monthly for our loss doesn't mean it's enough to feed this family off of! Everyone in this family who is able works or you can get the flick out this house and ill change the locks" Lynn started to rant.


Lynn could be nice but she could also have a pissy bad side and she was tough as nails.


As she turned her back John was sick of her rant and her treating him like shot lately so he sapped her with the Ray. To his unsurprised displeasure nothing seemed to happen yet.

Her rant continued.

"Also furthermore just so you know me and my boyfriend got my results at the clinic today and it turns out I'm pregnant so it's more important than ever that you Chrissy, Ben pull your weight at your jobs" finished Lynn.


John went pale as could be. 1st there was the prospect of his sister being pregnant then fear hit him.
Lynn may be a bitch often but he just tested an unknown device on his pregnant sister and now he feared any harm it might do to her baby.


Lynn for her part hadn't felt anything strange as the Ray hit her. She walked into the kitchen and John followed.

"Anyway it's nearly dinnertime. I ordered Pizza with that Gift Card you won from your works softball league tourney thing, consider that your payment for not working today. Any objections and ill sell your secret pornography stash" she said.


Although concerned about his porn John's more immediate concerns were his sister and her baby. So far he was thankful nothing seemed to happen.


As he thought that last part though the Ray began to work its magic or maybe it already had been working slowly all along John couldn't be sure.



Lynn had grabbed plates and was starting to set The dining room table since the dining room connected to the Kitchen.

Suddenly Lynn felt strange. John watched in disbelief as Lynn started to shrink and her breasts went from big D to mid B.

There was no doubt though Lynn was somehow growing younger. She had 2 peaks in her puberty the biggest being at 13 now that was becoming undone.


"W-whats happening to me" freaked Lynn as she lost a lot of height in 1 jolt and her chest was now flatter than a board.


Still Lynn shrank 5"1 4"9 4"5
Finally after about 6 minutes her changes came to a halt. There in a way too baggy shirt like a dress she stood. Her panties, skirt and shocks had fallen to the floor.


Lynn looked like she was 6 years old. She was reminded that as a child she like most girls in her family had always been very short for her age.


Lynn started to freak out!

"What happened to me? Oh my god I hope my baby will be okay"


John decides to admit to what he did and Lynn demands he fix it.

The giga-sized girl reached down for her new friend, grabbing her between her fingers. “Here you go!” Erika opened the front of her pull-up, and dropped Rachel in. Erika snaps it shut, trapping her friend, pressing the girl in close with the tight diaper.

“Now let’s squash everything!” She pulls up her dress, again revealing the diaper that had killed scores of people, and she dropped on to the country, squishing millions in a single drop of her pull-up clad behind. Having heard the earth tremble, she bounced up and down, causing a giant, butt shaped crater. “Hehehehe, dumb bugs!!” Erika called out. Erika got up, raised her foot over large masses of land, watching people’s futile efforts to flee, hearing the crowds of bugs cry out in panic. She then stamped down, silencing all the sound in an instant.

Erika continues about this for a few minutes, crushing millions of people in a matter of minutes.

“More!!!”

Erika hit herself with the gun again, this time growing so large that she could crush countries with one step or drop of her diapered butt. She went again to take a seat, and instantly wiped out the US. Then scorched over Canada, then back to Central America. The last sight over a billion people saw was the dirtied up pink pull-up with cupcakes on it, wipe out entire countries.

Erika has become a little goddess of destruction, squashing out all of humanity but herself and Rachel under her pull-up and her sneakers. She would go on, with her friend Rachel in tow, wiping out entire planets, all of which were simply toys to her.

Mitch Collins was not having a good day.
How could he with what had just happened?
He started his day the way he normally did,
shower, breakfast, met up with his friends
Mike and Andy, and then when to go hassle
little Suzy Wilson for her allowance and
for being short.


Things were going so well too.
He threw a few insults in, made a couple
of threats, and shoved her maybe one
too many times.
But like always the 7 year old folded like a
house of cards and gave him what he wanted.



Unfortunately today someone or something
decided to flip the script.


Right as he pocketed the money,
Mitch felt a strange feeling in the pit of
his stomach. It reminded him of the time
he had food poisoning.
His friends tried to ask him if he was
alright, but happened next proved he
was anything but.
In a matter of seconds his world had
changed forever.


The fifteen year old bully began to shrink.
It happened so fast it looked as if he disappeared.
Mike and Andy were stunned.
In their minds their friend had vanished
like a Vegas magician.
Either that or aliens had abducted him.
They were strange like that.
But more importantly they were scared
and did what all scared people do.


They ran.


While that was happening, on the ground
below, Mitch was fighting to stay on his
feet as numerous earthquakes threatened to
shake his world apart.
Everything was bigger than him now.
His friends were like skyscrapers and
the grass was like a jungle.
If had to guess he must be only
2 to 4 inches in height.
This was impossible, insane even!


He called out to his friends but it
was all for naught.
They had already headed for the hills, leaving
him to his fate.
He never even realized just how much
in a bad way he was as another earthquake
boomed behind him.


The shockwave knocked him flat to the
ground and he rolled over to greet the offender.


What he saw made his face go pale which
lead into his current situation.
He was mere inches tall looking up at one
of his usual victims... Suzy.
Worse yet, she was looking directly at him.


Mitch gulped. "Crap."

12231.content:
As Amber inspected the ray, her thumb pressed onto a smooth, black panel. She was about to continue looking, when the device let out a deep hum. The panel lit up, a bar of light moving up and down it. As far as she could tell, it seemed to be scanning her fingerprint. The teenage girl brought the panel to her eyes as the light on it died down, her expression shifting into one of confusion as nothing else seemed to happen.

Then, quite suddenly, the panel flashed red, the words 'Unauthorized user' scrolling across it. She went to drop the ray, but it wouldn't leave her hands. A shiver ran down Amber's spine as she felt energy flood into her. Her eyes widened as more words scrolled their way across the panel: 'Initiating thief neutralization, calling Doctor Jenner'

Amber quirked a brow in confusion, though her understanding wasn't too limited for long as energy shot out of the back of the device, covering her. It began to push inwards, forcing her body to compact more and more. She found herself getting smaller and smaller, and over the span of a few painful minutes, she'd gone from her normal height of 5'5", all the way down to 3" tall.

The ray stood over her, it's various lights dying down. She'd shrunken with her clothes, bag and books, luckily, but she was rather panicked.

Her gaze shot around, seeing the suburban landscape from a whole new perspective. Amber scrambled to her feet, only to have a shadow cast over her. Looking up, she saw it to be:

Amber froze as she saw the humongous person looming over her. Although it seemed to just be a child, the now rodent-sized girl was terrified beyond measure. As she readied herself to run, a large hand descended from the sky, swiping her up. She remained still, unable to move through the fear.

Her eyes widened in horror as a huge thumb ran down her front, seemingly straightening her clothes. Then the thumb returned, it's tip gently pushing her head up, forcing her to look into two gigantic sapphire eyes. Amber shuffled back, her face paling. She let out a surprised yelp as she felt her back hit something, the giant fingers curled up to keep her in the hand.

"I've never seen a moving dolly before," The giant girl spoke, voice laced with wonder as she used her free hand to twiddle one of her ginger pigtails. An innocent grin spread across her face at the small squeaky noise her new 'doll' let out, "Or one that talks,"

Amber flinched as she was brought in closer, now being able to smell the strong peppermint scent coming from each breath that washed over her.
"So teeny tiny," She murmured, the blue eyes widening in curiosity as two fingers pinched the teen girl's arm. Amber tried to fight the grip, but with a gentle squeeze, the young girl had all but stopped her resistance.

The tiny girl felt air rushing all around her as her three foot tall captor stood, the hand that held her moving towards her chest.
"I'm Molly, by the way, you're gonna be my new dolly," She smiled softly, tilting her hand so the miniature doll rolled into her front pocket. She then went to turn back into the nearby front garden.

12234.title: A bully and a reversal of fortune ( reserved )

122341.content:
Little McKenzie Short knew exactly what to expect when starting her day. She'd shower, get dressed, eat breakfast, receive lunch money from her parents, and walk to school. Another thing she expected was running into Mitch and his two friends. The three boys would constantly go out of their way to bully her and steal her lunch money.

She tried asking them to stop, but that seemed to only make them want to torture her more. They'd constantly mock her height and just loved to push her around. Mitch especially loved to make her cry. He was the worst of the three and it was out of fear of him that she didn't tell anyone what was going on. If she showed up soaking wet or with a black eye she just said she had an accident.

Today however he was feeling especially vicious. Not only did he steal her lunch money again, he actually forced down her skirt, exposing her underwear to the world and pushed her down. McKenzie could feel herself beginning to cry as he and his cronies began to laugh at her. Why did they even do this to her? She'd never done anything to them. Why couldn't they just leave her alone?

Why couldn't she teach them a lesson?

"Ha! Shorty crybaby is starting the waterworks again! I'm surprised she's not still in diapers!" Mitch teased, which got another roar of laughter from his friends.

McKenzie shut her eyes tight as her tears started flowing harder. She hated them. She really did. She hated them so much.

That's when she felt it, a warm and tingly sensation spreading all over her body. She quickly opened her eyes to see her three tormentors distracted by laughter, but something else as well. Everything around her looked like they were getting... smaller?

Was she... growing!?

That had to be it because everything else around her kept on shrinking. It was like the time her daddy accidently shrunk her socks in the laundry. Her crying soon ceased and gave way to complete and utter surprise, just how big was she going to get? She honestly didn't know, but her bullies soon began to take notice.

The three boys looked scared half to death, a foreign look she wasn't accustomed to. But one that made her feel all fuzzy inside. Soon her height surprised their own and the gang of boys began to slowly back away. They were scared of her.

Minutes passed and her growth kept on accelerating and accelerating until finally it came to a stop. Looking around she noticed she wasn't just big now, she was really big. Everything else was so tiny now and her bullies looked almost comically like dolls. She wasn't the best with math, but if she had to guess she must be at least 160feet if she stood up.

With that in mind she did stand up, pulling up her skirt along with her. This was incredible. She could see over the school and the whole neighborhood. McKenzie took a moment to take this all in before her sights eventually fell to the "bugs" at her feet.

Mitch, Mike, and Andy were all paralyzed with fear. What in the hell just happened. The pint sized girl just turned into a giant monster. The three starting sweating as they realized just how dire their situation was. They'd spent the better part of the last five months bulling this girl and now the tables had turned. Worse yet, she was looking right at them. And she didn't look too happy.

"Mitch?" Andy gulped nervously.

"Yeah man." he answered with as much fear and nervousness in his voice.

"What do we do now?"

"Yeah. I wanna know too." Mike whimpered.

To sat McKenzie was pissed would be an understatement, she was burning white hot with fury. She already hated these boys with a passion and even though she was bigger and stronger now, they still proceeded to mocker her. Mitch was actually begging her for mercy. How dare he! He never gave her a break when she begged him to stop. Seeing her weak and helpless made him smile. He loved watching her cry. Greg and Andy was just as bad.

Right now though the main target of her fury was Greg. The stupid boy just had to open his mouth and openly insult her. She was not a brat, and she wasn't ugly either. She was cute, her parents and teachers said so! And she was definitely not a weak little girl anymore. She was big and strong and she was going to teach them all a lesson. They hurt her... so she was going to make them hurt worse.

"Greg..." Mitch began fearfully, seeing the angry scowl on the girl's face. "Remember what I told you about picking your battles wisely?"

"Yeah?" He answered, not the least bit frightened by the giantess narrowed eyes. "Why?"

"Because you're a freaking idiot! That's why!" Andy snapped before Mitch could.

"Please." Greg brushed off. "Mitch could take this brat in his sleep. YOU HEAR THAT BRAT!? WE AIN'T SCARED OF YOU! HIT US WITH YOUR BEST SHOT!"

Something in McKenzie broke.

"I'm gonna kill you Greg!" Mitch finally snapped before a large shadow engulfed them. All three froze before slowly craning their necks up to reveal a giant pair of fingers coming straight for them.

"AHHHHH!!!"

"Hit the deck!" Andy screamed before dragging him and Mitch to the ground. Greg on the other hand decided to stand his ground like a complete and utter fool. "Greg!?" Andy screamed. "Get your ass down now!"

"Why? I ain't afraid of some little girl." he said stubbornly. That stubbornness would prove to be his own undoing as the giant pair of fingers plucked him up from the ground.

"GREG!!!" the two boys cried in fear for their friend.

While Greg wouldn't show it on the outside, inside he was sweating bullets. He was scared to death, but diluted himself into believing he wasn't. He mentally cursed himself and his macho attitude.

Meanwhile Amber had taken cover behind a nearby tree and looked on with wide eyes at what was happening. This was all her fault. If only she hadn't picked up that stupid ray. Now someone was going die all because of her damn curiosity. "I'm sorry." she whispered. "I'm sorry."

Greg began to sweat as he was brought face-to-face with McKenzie's eye. Even that was bigger than him. His mask finally started to crack as the weight of the situation bore down on him. He'd bitten off way more than he could chew here. It was then his father's words of wisdom came to mind as he stared into the burning inferno before him. "Hell hath no fury like a woman scorned."

"Oh shit." He whispered, wide-eyed in fear.

He was going to die...

1223412323.content:
McKenzie glared at Greg with all the malice of a raging fire. In all the time she'd had the displeasure of knowing the boy, he'd been nothing but a complete jerk. Even now when he was nothing more than but a bug compared to her, he still kept egging her on. Well, no more!

He needed to be taught a lesson. To hurt just like he and his friends hurt her. The only question was, what was the best way to do that? She didn't want to squish him, he wouldn't get off that easy. No, she wanted to make him suffer. But just how did she want him to suffer?

That's when she felt her nose itch. Stupid allergies! She hated how much they bothered her nose, especially when it would fill up with boogers and snot...

That's when the lightbulb went off. That's how she'd make him suffer. She'd turn one of her biggest problems to her own benefit. A cruel smile broke out on her face that looked way to foreign for someone her age. Mitch and Andy thought so too because they could feel a chill run down their spines.

Greg felt something hard settle in his stomach and down below, Amber felt the same. That smile looked like it belonged on a slasher, not a 5 year old. "Oh my god." she whispered. "She going to kill him."

"Greg!?" Mitch called, gaining the boy's attention. "You need to get out of her grip man, she's gonna kill you!"

Greg didn't need to be told twice as he tried and failed to put up a fight.

"Oh, I'm not gonna kill you." McKenzie stated. The boys looked confused. Amber looked relieved,

"Y-you're not." Greg asked.

"No." McKenzie answered plainly before her voice took a dark turn. "I want you to suffer."

Everyone's eyes widened in terror at that. Did she just say she wanted him to suffer?

"W-what are you gonna do to me?"

"Do you have allergies?" McKenzie inquired.

"No." Greg whimpered.

McKenzie sniffled. "I have really bad allergies so my nose is always giving me a problem. You're going to know what that feels like."

Greg didn't even have time to process what she meant before he noticed himself fast approaching the girl's right nostril. It didn't take a genus to put two-and-two together. She was going to stick him up her nasty ass nose. Oh god. At this size he could actually see the dried up snot coating the walls.

"No! No, please! I'm sorry!" Greg cried.

Too bad for him McKenzie didn't forgive him. All anybody could do was watch in horror as Greg disappeared up the girls nostril along with the tip of her finger. She actually shuddered as she began digging her finger in as deep as possible.

"GREG!!!" The boys cried.

Greg meanwhile felt himself thrust into a moist and humid cave. McKenzie's finger smashed and dragged him against the mucus covered walls. He began to gag as runny snot made it's way into his mouth. This was horrible, beyond disgusting. This was vile. He was coated in so much mucus that it actually wrapped him up like a cocoon from the neck down.

Worse yet, the girl's finger kept on driving him deeper and deeper and deeper until finally he just clung to a wall like glue. That's when she pulled her finger back and left him stuck to the wall like a fresh booger. There was even still snot running over him like a shower.

"AHHHH!!! GET ME OUT OF HERE!!!"

No could hear him. All anyone could see was McKenzie retracting her finger without Greg attached and rubbing her nose a little. She'd really done it. She'd really stuffed Greg up her nose without a hint of remorse. Needless to say everyone was scared to death. The boys more so than Amber.

"Jeez. Even with him up there my nose still bugs me. Sometimes I wish I didn't have one." McKenzie said to no one in particular. Her focus soon returned to the two remaining boys. "So now, how am I going to punish the two of you?"

1223412332.content:
"This isn't good." The male officer whispered as he stared into the burning pyre that was McKenzie's eyes. She was beyond angry, she was seething in a unstable combination of anger and hate. She really wanted to hurt these boys and given her childish mind and no doubt monstrous strength... she just might...

"I hope she eats them." Patty grumbled under her breath.

The male officer heard this. "That's enough Patty! What the hell is wrong with you!? We're officers of the law, that means our duty is to protect and serve!"

"Oh don't give me that crap, Charlie!" the female officer snapped. "Those three boys are nothing but delinquents! Rotten little shits that chose to pick on a defenseless girl who was obviously smaller than them and younger to boot! How can you just stand there and act like they don't deserve what's coming!?"

"BECAUSE THEY'RE KIDS!" Charlie roared, causing Patty's eyes to widen. "They're all just a bunch of stupid kids, Patty! Christ, they can't even drive or go out and buy booze! They're way too young to do or become murders. How can you stand there and tell three kids they deserve what they get and simultaneously encourage the younger one this kind of justice is okay?"

Patty went silent as her partners words rang true. What was she doing? Charlie was right, all of them where just a bunch of kids and kids were prone to making stupid decisions. She was a grown woman for god's sake and here she was encouraging what looked like an elementary school girl to hurt some boys because of her own personal feelings.

She felt so ashamed. "I'm sorry."

Charlie seemed to calm down. "It's okay Patty. Once this is resolved I promise you the boys will be punished properly, but right now we need to find a way to de-escalate the situation before someone winds up seriously injured or worse.

"You're right." she nodded.

The male officer smiled. "It's nice to be back on the same page."

He then turned his attention back to the giant who was glaring daggers at the boys.

"UM... GIRL? DO YOU MIND TELLING ME YOU'RE NAME?"

"MCKENZIE!" She snapped back at the officer.

"O-OKAY. MY NAME IS OFFICER CHARLIE GRIMES AND THIS IS MY PARTNER OFFICER PATTY LEWIS! NOW ALL WE WANT IS FOR EVERYONE TO JUST CALM DOWN BEFORE SOMEONE GETS HURT! CAN YOU DO THAT FOR US? JUST... CALM DOWN."

McKenzie could hear what the officer was asking and remembered what her parents told her about police. She looked towards the officers with a scowl and back to the boys with angry eyes before dropping Greg back into her palm. She wanted to hurt them, she really did, but she needed to listen to the 'boys in blue' as her mom liked to call them.

"O-Okay." McKenzie growled before trying to take a calming breath.

"It's working." Amber whispered from her hiding spot.

"I can't believe it's actually working." Patty smiled to Charlie.

Charlie smiled back. Everything was going great.

Greg groaned. "What happened?"

"The kid almost kid you." Mitch answered.

"Her--?"

"Don't you say one more word." Andy threatened. Greg nodded before cowering behind Mitch.

After a few minutes of calming breath's McKenzie's scowl seemed to almost melt away. Her eyes said she was still mad, but the flames of fury had been smothered somewhat.

"This is good Patty, call this in." Charlie whispered to his partner. Patty nodded and went to the squad car to call this in. "ALRIGHT MCKENZIE! NOW I WANT YOU TO GENTLY PUT THE BOYS ON THE GROUND! A STRONG AND TOUGH GIRL LIKE YOU CAN DO THAT, RIGHT!?"

Greg's eye twitched.

McKenzie frowned. "WHAT WILL HAPPEN TO THEM!?"

"THEY GET TO SPEND A NICE COUPLE HOURS DOWN AT THE PRECINCT, AND WE"LL BE MAKING SURE TO CALL THEIR PARENTS!"

Mitch, Andy, and Greg paled.

"My sister's gonna kill me." Mitch muttered.

"You're sister!? My old man's gonna hand me my ass!" Andy panicked.

Greg looked the most startled of all. "NOOO!" he freaked. "You can't just call our parents because of mount toddler here! Look at us right now, we're the victims here!"

McKenzie's teeth began grinding.

Mitch noticed this first and felt his blood run cold. "Greg, shut up!"

"Yeah, dude! Shut you're face!" Andy added quickly.

"Oh no." Amber whimpered.

Charlie heard what the boy was saying and saw the dying embers of the girl's fury starting to burn again. "YOUNG MAN, IT'S IN YOUR BEST INTEREST TO STOP TALKING!"

Greg meanwhile continued. "Help us old man! This twilight zone reject is gonna kill us!"

McKenzie's eye twitched.

"What's happening?" Patty asked as she ran up to Charlie and then got a good look at the giant's face. "Charlie?"

"MCKENZIE JUST STAY CALM! IGNORE HIM, IM SURE HE WAS DROPPED ON HIS HEAD AS A CHILD!"

"What?" Greg continued to rant, ignoring his friend's desperate pleads. "This gigaton psycho bitch needs to be taken down. Call in the swat team already!"

McKenzie finally had enough. "SHUT UP! SHUT UP! SHUT UP!"

Everyone had to cover their ears because of the shout. The smoldering embers had re-ignited into a blazing inferno.

"MCKENZIE PLEASE JUST EASE THEM DOWN BEFORE YOU DO SOMETHING YOU'LL REGRET!"

"NO!" She shot back before closing her fist around the boys, trapping them. "THEY! ARE! MINE!"

13.title: Genius inventor options

choices: The lucky or unlucky soul that finds the Bats-R Ray

An unfortunate soul who comes afoul the ray without gaining ownership
133.content:
It was a bright sunny day at local high school. It should have been storming. In these types of situations a powerful thunderstorm is always appropriate, but there was a completely cloudless sky. Sometimes the weather just won't cooperate.

In science lab on the second floor something amazing was happening. A sandy haired 16 year old was hard at work on what had started as his science project. Unfortunately for the child he was one of those special kinds of geniuses. The type that comes up with ideas that are nothing less than genius and completely revolutionize the world. However, it was also the type of genius who lacked the wisdom to know that just because you could do something didn't mean you should.

His name was Alex.

"At last my greatest invention is finally complete!" Alex gave a triumphant shout. "And, I feel this would be a lot better with an audience." He let out a sigh. He was spending his lunch in the science lab alone. "I'm pretty sure I'm supposed to monologue or something about what I'm about to do but, alone it's just not the same." He let out another sigh and then began to speak loudly to the empty room about what he had built, but from the tone of his voice it was clearly he wasn't into it.

"It is finally done!" He shouted in a monotone voice. "Though about a month late for the science fair. Still, I have created the Biological Attribute Time and Space Reformation Ray! Or, Bats-R Ray for short. This modern miracle of science has the capability to compress or stretch the spacial and temporal axis regardless of what their natural point in time and space would be. In layman terms, it makes people and animals bigger or smaller as you change their spacial axis or younger and older as you change their temporal axis."

The device that sat in front of Alex on a shelf next to a window was about the size of a super soaker but completely gray in color and covered with wires, flashing lights, buttons. There were to switches one for age and one for size and a knob that could adjust the power output on the ray.

"Well then, let's get this thing started up!" At this point Alex seemed to become a lot more excited now that he had gotten through his monologue and got to actually test out the gadget he had made. "Let's see, teacher said I'll in huge trouble if I test anything on the class pet again. Only other living there here is me. Well should be fine, but just to be safe, let's only do a minor change to start out." Alex walked up to the ray, switched off the switch for age, then flipped on the switch for size. He set it for 50% reduction, put on a timer and then stood in front of it.

A beam of pure blue light erupted from the tip of the ray and struck Alex squarely in the chest. The effects were noticeable immediately. The entire room seemed to swell from Alex's point of view, as wore his clothes. His shoes were suddenly comically large on him, going up to almost his knees despite being sneakers. The rest of his clothes weren't doing much better, his pants and underwear having completely fallen off of him. Luckily, his shirt was also much bigger on him, and though it clung loosely to his shoulders it stayed on and hung all the way down to his shins maintaining his modesty.

"Note to self." Alex spoke to himself as he finished shrinking, settling in at a new height around two and a half feet. "Invent size changing pants." The boy quickly climbed out of his oversized shoes and pants that were tangled around his leg and stood in the classroom dressed only in his much longer shirt. The top of the shelf was now over his head and he couldn't even see his invention. It was surreal, the way that the tops of student desks were now about level with his head. He walked around the classroom for a bit examining how much bigger everything was getting excited by the fact the thing worked.

"Well fun is fun, but probably better change myself back." Alex muttered and walked back over to the shelf and tried to reach up to get the invention. The shelf was higher than his head so he couldn't see and had to reach over the shelf and grope with his arms to try and find what he was looking for. He brushed the edge of the Bats-R Ray. As he did he felt it slide backwards away from his hand, and then heard an unfortunate crash as it bumped into the window breaking it, and proceeded to fall right out the window and away from Alex leaving him stuck like this in the second floor lab.

"That's... not a good noise." Alex whimpered. "Wait, it's okay. I haven't lost the Bats-R Ray I've merely misplaced it, I just need to go outside and look for it, while I'm the size of a toddler. Okay it could be worse." He started to walk towards the door, only to stop when his shirt brushed against his ankle instead of his shin. It was now longer on him. "Oh, that can't be good."

Not only had he lost the ray he was still getting smaller.

Now which protagonist shall we follow in this story?
133.title: The Perils of Scientific Genius

1331.content:
Outside the lab most people didn't even notice as the invention fell out of the window and towards the ground below. The device landed in bushes next to the wall of the school building which prevented it from being broken from the fall. Here it remained mostly out of site as numerous students and teachers alike walked right past the device not knowing what was hidden there.

One person did notice the ray though. They nearly tripped over the edge of it that was sticking out of the bush and when they bent down to examine what was there that was when they found out.

The person who found the invention was..

133112.content:
Luke was walking down the street for ages then he came by a small local Amusement park emphasis on small.


The place had maybe 5 rides max , 3 food stands and restrooms. It was also geared towards kids and was aptly named "Kiddyville kids fun land"

Corny and lame. Today a group of Kindergartener kids seemed to be visiting.


Luke normally wouldn't care but as he kept walking he heard crying. He looked around then down and saw a kid.




It was a little girl. She had Brown hair and blue eyes. Those weren't what caught Luke's attention. Luke noticed this girl was short in fact crazy short for her age. In fact her classmates she was with on the field trip were twice her size. In fact other than psychical age appearance this runt could pass for a baby.



Luke listened in on the girl as she sobbed.


"It's no fair! The boys and girls tease me and I'm too short to do anything fun. I can't even climb up on the stupid dummy head benches!" She said shooting a glare at the bench beside her.



"I must be the shortest 5 year old ever! Mommy says that the doctor can't expwain my size but it stinks! I hate being so small and short. It's not my fault I'm a shrimp I should still be able to do fun stuff. I wish I were bigger! Being called Little Lucy is no fun"



This was all Luke needed to hear. With a grin he took aim as the girl broke out into more tears.


Luke noticed some kind of timers on the device but both seemed busted so shrugging he pulled the trigger and shot the girl seemingly identified as Lucy with the same dose Alex received awhile back.



The blue beam surrounded Lucy and faded once Luke let the trigger go. Lucy was too busy crying to notice or feel anything. To Luke's annoyance and disappointment nothing seemed to happen to the crying girl.



Annoyed he fired a 2nd shot twice as long but still nothing.


"Damn as I thought this thing is bogus junk" with that Luke continued on his way with the device.


Had he stayed he would've seen what happened next.


Once Luke was out of sight Lucy began to feel strange.


"Huh I feel weird all the sudden" she said.


Looking around she noticed the ground seemed to be moving.

"Huh is the ground moving? And why do I feel all tingly?"


Then it dawned on her

"Wait the ground isn't moving I'm finally growing" she cheered as she inched up in height her body growing evenly all over until unlike Alex Lucy stopped growing exactlyat twice her prior normal size.




Lucy now 3"1 could reach the bench but also to her glee she now met the 3 foot tall requirements for the rides.
133112.title: Passes and zaps a crying 5 year old on a field ...

choices: Try to find her way home
Make the park into a play room
Find someone who won't run away from her
1331121.content:
Lucy got in line for the kiddie coaster, over excited for her first ever time on a ride.



"Hey look mister I'm tall enough for the ride now!" she said to the operator, who couldn't seem to care less, it was just another day on the job for him.



Lucy was having a hard time reaching the step into the ride at the back seat, but was helped by the operator, who was shocked by how heavy she was. He lowered the bar over her legs to make sure she didn't fidget too much during the ride.



The ride started and after about 15 seconds of it Lucy began to feel tingly again. she felt uncomfortable with the bar on her legs, and the discomfort was getting worse, next the ride started to slow down to a halt, much to the chagrin of the operator, who was confused but then realized he saw the little girl in the back growing larger and larger, the bar over her legs gave out and Lucy stepped out of the cart so find it much smaller than she had seen it before. The operator fainted at the site of the young girl, who despite her young appearance, was now over 6' tall.



"I guess I'm big enough for the grown up rides now!" Lucy thrilled, and she headed for the bigger roller coaster in the park.


The park goers stared in awe of this large child, some thinking she was some sort of mascot, others were without words.



Soon Lucy found herself at the othe coasters. The line was practically empty, and she got right on to the first adult roller coaster of her life, but oddly the operator had abandoned their post, so she went and sat in the front seat.



It was at that moment that Lucy began to feel the tingles again and this time she was fully aware of her growth, and even enjoyed it.


She stepped out of the ride and stood by the measurement station for the coaster and watched herself hit 7', 8', 11' and finally 12'4".


She was in awe at the fact she had doubled in size.


"Well now I cant go on any of these rides!" Lucy said with a grave disappointment. "I guess I will have to make my own fun then!"



She sought out the carousel and decided she wanted one of the horses for herself. At her size it took almost no effort to remove one of the horses from the ride, any remaining bystanders were finally fleeing the scene.



"Hey don't leave me all alone! How am I supposed to get home?" Lucy asked, then began to pout and sat down with her new toy horse and began to sniffle and cry.


The jumbo size 5 year old was simply too young, innocent, naive and ignorant to the full extent and gravity of the situation.

"Now I'm all alone again and no one will help me home *sniff* I hope mommy and daddy won't be mad at me like last"

She said recalling the time on a past feild trip a different teacher left her and her parents had to come get her.
Her father was so upset he hit both her and her mom.
Her mother later slapped her.


Lucy held her "toy" horse with 2 hands as even being 12'4
the horse was still bigger than her hands.

Still sobbing she continued
"You won't leave me will you horsey" she asked hugging it to her cheek.




Suddenly The ground and her body began to vibrate a little this time around when Lucy felt the tingles this time.



She knew what was coming and at least took some excitement in that. She watched as the new toy horse she had taken grew smaller and smaller in her hands, she ballooned up and up and up in small spurts this time, instead of steady growth. Her body hiccuped to 15' then 18', followed by a larger burst into 24' 8"


Lucy stood up, saw that her head was way above the tops of most of the rides, and she decided to...


*Author/Mod note- edited 2/10/17 237 PM For various reasons still willing to give credit for the story add tho*
1331121.title: Lucy has some lingering effects...

choices: Stick with the parents and cops
With Lucy ( no ones following her yet )
13311213.content:
Lucy stood up, saw that her head was way above the tops of most of the rides, and she decided to
Find someone who won't run away from her.

The 24 foot 8 tall 5 year old looked around.
Unsure what direction to head she eventually decided to try searching the back half of the amusement park which she hadn't yet been to.


"Toy" horse still cradled in her arms she searched and search.
Unfortunately the park was largely deserted the guests and workers having fled from the sight of a growing child.


Meanwhile the one who had zapped Lucy was outside a house when he heard a fight.



"Dam it Susan that bitch slut brat of a daughter of yours got lost on a field trip again!"
There was a slap and throwing of stuff.

"You should have listened to me aborted Lucy, she's every bit the mistake her mother is. When we get her back I'm going to beat you both senseless!"


Then the phone rings. The man answers.
There's some back and forth.

"Ah good job Rick I knew having a cop in the family who thinks like me was good.
Me and Susan will be right down to deal with the brat"

He had the phone on speaker.

"Wait Tom there's something you should know...

It was too late the man presumably Tom hung up.




Later at the park. The one who grew Lucy had went back having followed the quarreling couple.

There the couple met 1 lone police officer.

"Tom before you proceed there's something you need to know"

"Listen Rick I know all I need to know. You found that brat Lucy and I'm gonna beat the crap out of her till she finally learns her dam lesson"

He was too busy in his tirade to notice the ground shake or the shadow behind him.

Suddenly a sad frightened voice spoke.

"I'm sorry daddy just please don't hurt me again"


Tom still confident and not facing the source of the voice replied.

"Oh you're gonna be sorry when I get done wit you little...
He trailed off as he turned around and looked up.


There stood his 5 year old daughter who he'd abused now 30 feet tall.


Her parents were in shock. Tom for his part could only make strange sounds with his mouth.


Lucy who'd been scared till this point took in her parents behavior.
As a few cop cars rolled up a realization was occurring.

It wasn't in the expected way luckily for Lucy's parents and was more childish and innocent yet a realization nonetheless.

"Wait mommy and daddy are down there? But if I'm too big for the adult rides then..."
As it clicked her fear started to subside and demeanor changed slightly.


"NO I'm bigger than you and mommy now! You're not gonna hurt me anymore! I'm bigger than you so I don't have ya listen no more or be hit by you"

With that the 30 foot child dashed off into the woods nearby.

The cops and parents were too in shock to do much.


The guy with the size gun pondered what to do.
The one thing he was sure of was he definitely no longer had the heard to shrink her back to size.
If he did he'd be condemning her back to being a victim.
13311213.title: Find someone who won't run away from her

choices: Alex was both shrinking and getting younger!
1332.content:
Alex stopped on his way to the door of the lab as he realized his shirt was even looser on him than it had been. hen he had shrunk himself down to two and a half feet tall. Right after he had shrunk the bottom of his shirt had reached down to his shins, now it was touching his ankles. This wasn't a huge difference, but it was still a difference and he was quick to pick up on the implication of it.

He shouldn't still be shrinking if the machine was working right, but there was the chance that he had slightly miscalculated, pressed the wrong button, or done a number of other things and so might still be getting smaller. He had to find out quickly. He looked around the classroom trying to find a mirror he could examine himself in. There was one hung on the wall near the back of the lab, but at his current height he couldn't exactly see into it easily. He found a stool and pushed the stool across the room towards the wall. He was surprised how heavy it was, but considering he was a little less than half the size of a normal high school student it wasn't that surprising.

It took him several minutes to get the stool over to the wall, and then he tried to climb on top of it. Even at his small size climbing the stool wouldn't have posed to much of a problem, but his movement was limited by how big his shirt was on him, and so he nearly tripped over his own shirt several times trying to get up onto the stool. Once on top of the stool he stood up, easily able to stand and balance on top of it. Now his shirt was actually touching the top of his feet. He was definitely still changing.

He looked in the mirror to examine himself and find out exactly what was going on and there he saw...
1332.title: The Shrinking Genius

13321.content:
As Alex watched himself in the mirror he noticed his shirt seemed to be getting bigger on him. He quickly climbed down from the stool and looked around the lab until he was able to find a tape measure. Picking it up he was able to measure himself, he was two feet tall exactly. He had lost six inches since he first shrunk himself. His shirt was now touching the floor completely obscuring his legs and feet from view. The top of the shirt was barely hanging onto his arms and he suspected that if he tried to hold his arms down to his side the shirt would fall right off.

To make things worst, the shrinking didn't appear to be stopping there, even as he measured himself at two feet Alex noticed he had gone down a half inch on the tape measure. It did not appear he was going to stop shrinking, at least not soon.

He tried to remember where the Bats-R Ray had landed outside. He needed to get to the ray to reverse the shrinking. If he didn't take care of it soon he might wind up as small as a mouse, maybe even smaller he had no idea when the shrinking was going to stop. He ran for the door to the lab then stopped. A high school could be a pretty dangerous place if he shrunk as small as a mouse, and he was going to have to get down a flight of stairs.

Did he really want to run out there? He wanted to stop the shrinking, but he didn't want to do anything to dangerous. Maybe he should wait for one of his teachers or another student to come into the lab and send them after the ray. Not to mention he didn't even know if he'd be big enough to operate the device by the time he got to it.

Yet, who knew how small he would be by the time help arrived.

He thought for a moment and made his decision.
13321.title: Alex was still shrinking!

choices: Alex leaves the lab on his own
Alex stays in the lab to wait for help
13322.content:
Alex gasped as he looked into the mirror. He was shorter than two and a half feet now, but it wasn't because he was shrinking! Well he supposed technically he was kind of shrinking, but it was something different. The device he had built had two functions on it, and changing size was only one of them. He looked into the mirror and saw that his facial features had changed slightly. They were softer, his skin was fairer, and his general frame was a little squatter. Even accounting for the size change, he looked like he belonged in middle school instead of high school.

The Bats-R Ray could make things bigger or smaller, but it could also make things younger or older. Alex was getting younger. He only looked to be about two years younger than he had started, probably 14 instead of 16, but it was noticeable. The problem was that from the feel of the shirt getting bigger on him he was continuing to get younger, and he watched in the mirror as he changed from a 14 year old into a 13 year old.

"Okay, okay okay." Alex spoke out loud to himself to help stay calm. "There's nothing wrong here, this just proves that the machine can do what it was built to do. Just need to retrieve the device and Alex could turn himself back to normal. He went back to the window the device had fallen out of and climbed up onto the edge to get a look at the area outside it would have been in.

It wouldn't take him to long to get down there. Still, he thought for a moment. He looked like a middle schooler, he was about the size of a toddler, maybe he shouldn't go out there by himself right now. Might be safer if he had someone else to go look for it for him, there was no one here right now but surely a teacher would be in to check on him soon, or another student would have to stop by the lab.

He thought for a moment, he was getting younger by the moment, and he didn't know when he would stop getting younger. If he wound up getting to young he might not be able to actually talk to anyone that came in. Was it safer to wait for someone else to come in, or better to explore the school on his own and try to reclaim his invention.
13322.title: Alex was getting younger!

choices: Alex left the lab and went after the Bats-R Ray alone
Alex waited in the lab for someone else to show up
13323.content:
Alex let out a gasp as he saw himself in the mirror and nearly fell off the stood. As he did his shirt slipped right off his shoulders and nearly fell off him completely. Alex managed to grab the shirt and hold it at his waistline to keep himself from being completely naked, but he was still shocked.

He was indeed still shrinking and getting smaller, but that wasn't all that was happening. The Bats-R Ray was capable of more than just changing the size of things. It could move a person along their personal timeline making them younger or older. As Alex stared at the half naked boy in the mirror, he saw staring back at him who couldn't be older than 14. Two years younger than he was supposed to be. He was both shrinking smaller and getting younger. The combination of the two resulted in him being small enough that he couldn't even keep his shirt on properly and had to hold it up to his waist to avoid being naked.

With some difficulty Alex managed to climb down from the chair. His shirt hindered him at every moment as it constantly got tangled up in his legs, but as the very last article between him and being completely naked he refused to abandon it. He got onto the floor quickly, well as quickly as he could explored the lab looking for a measuring tape. He found one, and upon measuring himself learned he was only about a foot and a half now. He had lost a whole foot of height from the combination of shrinking and regressing in age. He was probably down to 13 or 12 years of age by this point too.

Alex took a deep breath. The Bats-R Ray could reverse this easily enough, he just had to get to it, but he wasn't sure how well that was going to go on his own. He wasn't sure how young or small he was going to get, and he imagined if he wound up as a foot tall toddler taking the stairs down to the first floor might prove troublesome. He really wished that he had someone to go with him so that if he got into trouble he'd be fine.

He supposed he could wait in the lab till a teacher or another student showed up, but that came with its own risks. He thought for a moment what it would be like if his teacher came into the lab and saw little baby as small as a mouse on the floor. He wouldn't exactly be able to explain things very well in that state. Maybe he was worrying over nothing, he might not get that small or young, but the problem is he really didn't show. He wasn't supposed to get younger at all, or shrink under two and a half feet.

He needed to decide if it was more dangerous to go alone, or to wait for someone despite the ray's effects.
13323.title: Alex was both shrinking and getting younger!

choices: Alex is stuck waiting and shrinking
Alex finds a creative way pass the door
133231.content:
Alex didn't see himself as having a choice. Who knew when another student or professor would come along. By the time they arrived the Bats-R Ray might go missing! Despite the inherent risk he was going to have to go after it. He struggled to keep his shirt on as he moved towards the classroom door. He was down to eleven years of age now and only about two feet tall if even that. His shirt and last protection of his modesty wouldn't last long like this. He paused just briefly to rearrange the shirt on himself. When he was done he was wearing it less as a shirt, and more as a toga that covered most of chest and legs. He looked strange in it, but it was better than running around naked.

With that Alex tried to leave the classroom. The doorknob was difficult to reach and he had to push a stool over to reach it. He realized he would have a similar problem getting outside the actual school building... But at least that would be the only other door between him and the ray. He'd figure that one out when he got down the stairs.

Alex shoved the door open just enough of a crack for him to see out. Thankfully it was outside normal school hours. The halls looked abandoned for now, they usually were on the weekends. Only a few people or professors with ongoing projects and approaching deadlines ever game into the lab here. Admittedly, running into a trusted professor might make things easier. On the other hand he was a little embarrassed at his current state. For now he's be happy to be alone, but if someone did find him he reminded himself not to turn down the chance for help.

Alex strode out into the hall, his bare feet moving across the cold tile floor. As he moved... He couldn't help but notice how creepy the school halls were when they were abandoned. It was almost like anything could be waiting to jump out at him. He found himself jumping at the slightest noise each time he heard it. He was jogged from this fear by another though... as his makeshift toga began to slip over his feet. That was right, he was still getting smaller and younger! He tried to remind himself, he had been through the school countless times! His younger brain was playing tricks on him, making him thinking something absolutely normal was spooky. He wondered how old he was now, it was hard to guess without examining himself. However judging by the rate he had been regressing in the lab he could estimate he was somewhere around 8 or 9.

Alex reached the stairs. Each stair represented a considerable drop in height for him. He was only about a foot and a half tall now. Each movement his toga threatened to get tangled up in his legs and trip him. The threat was only compounded with him having to lower himself down each stair. Each step down was likely around 7 inches down. That was almost half his body height. He couldn't simply walk down. He had to slowly turn and lower himself down each step one by one. It was a slow and arduous process. It only got harder as he got smaller.

Eventually Alex reached the bottom. He was now down to a mere foot tall. Worse, he was no older than seven years of age. His toga no longer fit at all. He carried it around him as if he had tried to drape himself in a tent. He quickly shambled towards the front door of the lab as fast as he could. There ha paused. The door was one of the ones you had to push on the handle to get outside. From his vantage he could see no possible way to get past the door. Was he just stuck here until someone came along?
133231.title: Exploring the Halls And Getting Smaller

choices: Alex was soon a little kid the size of a mouse
Alex was an insect sized little toddler
1332311.content:
Alex was stuck. There was no possible way to open the door while being a mere foot tall. He sat down in front of the door and pouted like the child he was becoming. It wasn't fair! Now he was going to have to wait on another student or an adult! And they'd probably yell at him when they found him! And talk about how this was his fault for always working without supervision! Dumb adults! What did they know!

Alex fumed to himself at his powerlessness and the lecture he expected to come as he continued to dwindle. He got smaller and younger as he waited... Soon the shirt he had been using as a toga couldn't fit him at all. It fell to the ground with no physical way for him to hold it up. That was unfortunate... But he was feeling strangely less modest now... Possibly due to his younger age it was harder to comprehend why people cared about such things.

At least the giant discarded shirt made a warm place to rest. He climbed on top of it and laid down on his back. It was much softer and warmer than the stupid tile floor he had been sitting on. He'd just wait near the door and when someone came in next he'd find them... In the meantime he continued to get smaller until...
1332311.title: Alex is stuck waiting and shrinking

choices: Alex tries to get the attention of the entering giant
Alex tries to run out the door without being noticed
13323111.content:
By the time the shrinking finally stopped Alex was quite young. He was a five year old child, a kindergartner. He looked more like he belonged in elementary school than any kind of advanced science program. That was of course if anyone was too even notice the tiny child that small. Alex had shrunken all the way down in size to a mere two inches tall. The little kid was on the same scale as small rodents now rather than any human.

With nothing to do Alex had fallen asleep. He had climbed up atop the shirt he had been wearing when he was still large enough to wear clothes. wrapping himself up in the folds of the fabric he had planned to wait alertly... But soon found himself fast asleep. He wasn't sure how long he napped on the floor in front of the door like that. However he was eventually awakened by the sound of giant footsteps.

It took Alex a moment to register what was happening. Once he did he snapped to full awakeness! Someone was coming! They could help! He looked around trying to figure out from where... And then realized the noise was coming from outside. Staring up at the giant windows in the door he could see the silhouette of someone on the other side. They were about to come in and open the door! Now he could get their help, get to the Bats-R Ray and change himself back to normal!

Except... If it was an adult he might get lectured. It's funny, when he first woke up this morning the idea of getting lectured by an adult was mildly annoying at best... But to his little five year old brain it was like the end of the world! Maybe it would be best if they didn't notice him. When the door opened he could just try to run out... And then go find the Bats-R Ray on his own.

He looked up. The door creaked as it began to open. It was time to make a decision.

134.title: A Genius female teen prodigy ( options inside )

1343.content:
"Aha, finally!"

Child prodigy Connie adjusted her glasses, and closed the flap to the control panel of her new invention; a shrinking ray!

While it wasn't the most portable, being almost two feet long and weighing a considerable amount, young Connie was sure that this prototype of hers would pave the future of modern science as she knew it. After all, there were endless possibilities for a machine that could shrink or grow things.

Growing food to giant proportions and combating world hunger.

Reducing the size of criminals to stop overpopulation in prisons.

Perhaps even shrinking entire civilisations to fight against the overcrowding of large cities!

"Endless!" She reiterated to herself, running a hand through her greasy brunette hair and realising that perhaps she needed a shower.

"Now, should probably test it before going any further with the celebrations..." She muttered to no one, heaving the ray off of her workbench and adjusting the strap to fit her skinny frame, "but what on...?"

After a moment's musing, Connie decided the best first target would be...

choices: Oh no Malfunction! Ever Growing Emily emerges!
Oops miscalculation or accident! Surprise say hello to Super Size Sara!
13432.content:
"Endless!" She reiterated to herself, running a hand through her greasy brunette hair and realising that perhaps she needed a shower.

"Now, should probably test it before going any further with the celebrations..." She muttered to no one, heaving the ray off of her workbench and adjusting the strap to fit her skinny frame, "but what on...?"

After a moment's musing, Connie decided the best first target would be 1 of her younger siblings but which one?


8 year old Liz

5 year old Emily

And 3 year old Sara
13432.title: Something living (one of her siblings?)

134322.content:
As Connie was deciding which of her siblings to test her size changing remote on she just noticed she heard the sound of buzzing in her hand. When she looked down and she saw that her invention was sparking and going a little haywire. "Oh no! Not now" she said to herself with worry. After spending countless weeks and nonstop devotion her size changing Ray is now starting to malfunction. "And here I thought it was all finally worth it, what could've happened?" she asked. After examining she saw that it was just a simple error that could be fixed in no time. "This shouldn't take long at all, should have this bad boy ready in a jif!" she said.


During this time Emily was bored and looking for someone to play with, Liz had locked her door and was taking a nap while Sara was being all fussy and couldn't play with her at the moment she asked Connie earlier several times but was always sent away, always forced to listen to her, Emily's given reason to do so was because Connie was bigger than her. Leaving Emily annoyed with Connie and have no one to play with. But after hearing Sara be fussy for so long she went to go find Connie not only to take care of her but to get another chance at them playing two playing a game. "Connie? Where are you? "Oh god no!" yelled Connie the light began to fade as Emily was revealed to not have changed at all. Connie was looking at the settings again, it still read 300% and Growth, why was nothing happening?



"Oh well, I guess it's busted at the moment, I will need to repair it before we can turn you back to normal." A sigh of relief left her. "Thank god the ray is broken."

13511.content:
Kaede was home fawning over pictures of her crush Yuuki.


She was so wrapped up she hadn't heard the doorbell ring. Her mom answered it and several minutes later entered Kaede's room.


"Kaede I'm about to head out for the day. Before I go though you got a package" she said setting the box on her daughter's bed.


"Now be good while I'm away with Aunt Mel" she added before leaving to finish packing and leave.


Kaede was curious. She took the package and examined it then opened it. Inside was a note and a toy gun looking device.


"Congratulations lucky winner we heard you were curious what it would be like to be fairy size. Well wonder no more. With the enclosed Size-O-Gun be any size you want. Enjoy hours of size fun"




Kaede was skeptical to say the least but decided why not try the device. Examining it she found many settings. She decided on " Shrink 90% 1shot"


Hopeful the gun would work as she wanted she stood still in front of her bed as she shot at her mirror.



A red beam fired out racing towards the mirror. It stuck the mirror and seemed to hang there a few moments before bouncing back at Kaede. Slightly startled despite it being her plan she dropped the gun on her bed as the beam energy surrounded her.


https://twitter.com/PKLewd2015/status/61...


Shielding her eyes she began to shrink. At first the shrinking was slow but then the pace sped up. In about a minute the gun had run its course for now and the Shrinking stopped leaving Kaede only a few inches tall.


She uncovered her eyes and looked around the room shocked. 1st at herself then above her.

https://twitter.com/PKLewd2015/status/61...


"M-my room...it's huge" she exclaimed.





( Author / writers note sorry for the rushed shrinking in such but this is based heavily on an Anime episode/Manga chapter with many things modified. Slower growth and changes will come further in or you do them in reader choices below )

135322.content:
It was another nice sunny day in the Kalos region.

Ash , Clement and Bonnie were on their way to Ash's next Gym Battle with a stop planned at a Pokemon Showcase on the way.



The gang were in a wooded area and stopped for lunch.
As they ate the usual fight over food took place among the Pokemon.


Behind some bushes Team Rocket was eating as well while they spied.


The gang soon finished lunch.
"Yumm delicious as always! After that big meal training is just thing to burn off some calories" said Ash


"Sounds like a good plan to me" said Clement. "And I've got just the thing! The future is now thanks to science" he continued.


Clement then took out a big remote from his bag.


"I give you my "Quick Experience and Stat Boosting for more efficient training remote mark 1" it makes training far more effective" he said.


"Wow Science is so amazing" said Ash.



"The name is kinda long and could use work tough" said Bonnie


"Isn't kind of like cheating or an unfair advantage though" asked Serena.


"Yeah no offense big brother but Serena is right" chimed in Bonnie.


Clement was utterly defeated and sat the device on top of his bag.


"Fine good old fashion battle training it is" said Clement.


Team Rocket meanwhile had been eavesdropping.


"So the Twerp invented something to help Pokemon get stronger eh? Sounds like a something we could use" said Meowth.


"It's brilliant if we steal the Twerps invention combine it with one of our gadgets and a power boost we can use it on Pikachu and Dedenne we can make them even more the cream of crop for when we steal them" said Jessie.



"They'll be the most Primo Pickins ever picked" said Meowth





Carefully as the gang trained they snuck over to the bag with the aid of the bush. Then they grabbed the device and snuck back off.




Later they finished their training and packed up.

Clement didn't even notice the remote missing as they set back out on the road.



As they walked down the path suddenly Ash, Serena and Clement fell into a hole.
Pikachu and Bonnie barely avoided it but Dedenne and her purse she carries it in came off.



"Ouch that hurt" said Bonnie falling on her face due to losing her balance.



"Oh no don't tell me it's who I think it is" groaned Ash in the hole.


A Robot knocked aside a few trees and appeared shaped like a giant Meowth with the letter "R" on it and a bit satellite antenna dish thing on its head.


Jessie, James and Wobuffet were on top.




"To unite our peoples within our nation." James said.


"To denounce the evils of truth and love." Jessie said.


"To extend our reach beyond the stars above." James said.


"Jessie!"


"James!"


"Team Rocket... Bringing trouble at a break neck pace" Jessie said.


"Surrender now, or prepare to fight, fight, fight!" James said.


"Meowth! That's right!" Meowth said.


"Wobbuffet!!!"


"Oh no it's Team Rocket" said Bonnie


"Grrr Team Rocket" growled Ash as he , Serena and Clement tried to get out of the hole.


"Hey why aren't all the Twerps in the hole" asked James


"Who cares it's just the littlest Twerp and a Twerpette to boot" said Meowth.



"Meanies if I were bigger you'd be sorry" said Bonnie.


"Oh please once a little Twerp always a little Twerp. Besides even if you grew overnight we'd still be bigger" huffed Jessie.


"Enough tiny Twerpish talk handover Pikachu and Dedenne" said Meowth controlling the robot.



"No way" said Bonnie.


"Pika"
"De-denne- ne" said both Pokemon rushing forward to defy Team Rocket.



"Ha those saps are playing right into our hands" said Meowth. "Now time for phase 2 of the plan" he added pressing a button. The satellite on the robots head powered up and the red energy building up obscured the fact that Clement's device was in the center.


"Take this Pikachu and Dedenne" added Meowth



A beam started to fire.

"No leave Pikachu and Dedenne alone" yelled Bonnie jumping in front of of the 2 Pokemon and in the beams path.


Both Pokemon looked at Bonnie shocked. The beam struck Bonnie and she got shocked.


"Aaaaa" yelled Bonnie as the red energy surrounded her.



A few moments later the machine started to smoke.

"Uh oh somethings wrong with the machine" said Meowth.


"Well then turn it off" said James.



Meier tried turn it off but instead as is typical with a Clement invention it began to malfunction and the power of the beam continued to intensify.


"Aaaaa" shouted Bonnie as the energy grew stronger shocking her more.


After a few minutes of steadily growing stronger the machine started to spark and the beam stopped.


"Uh oh I got that flying feeling again" relented Meowth.



The machine then exploded into pieces and sent Team Rocket flying.


"Looks like Team Rocket's blasting off againnnnn" shouted the attempted thieves.



The energy around Bonnie slowly faded and although she seemed unarmed she fainted.



Ash, Serena and Clement managed to escape the pit in town to see Bonnie pass out.



They rushed over to her. "Oh no Bonnie" panicked Clement.

They quickly rushed to give her first aid.



Later the sun was setting and Bonnie was still out cold.Serena put a fresh rag on Bonnie's forehead. She seemed to have a fever.



"How's Bonnie doing" asked a concerned Clement.



"Her fever appears to be going down. I think she's going to be okay" said Serena.


Just then Bonnie began to stir.

"Huh what happened" she said.


"Bonnie thank goodness you're okay" said Clement.


"Oh yeah that's right last thing I remember that weird beam from Team Rocket's robot coming at me" said Bonnie.



"Yeah we were worried you were hurt by whatever they did" replied Clement.


"You still have a slight fever though you should take some medicine and rest some more" said Serena.



"Ohhh Okay" whined Bonnie. She winced at the taste of the medicine. "I'm sorry to be trouble" she relented.




"It's fine besides you saved Pikachu and Dedenne" chimed in Ash.


"Yeah and besides you're still a little it's our job to take care you" said Clement.



"I know but sometimes I wish I were bigger then I could take care of myself" said Bonnie.



"You'll grow up soon enough and someday you'll be big enough to handle things on your own" said Clement.



With that Bonnie went back to sleep.


That night as everyone slept though Bonnie began to change. Still wearing her usual clothes she began to slowly grow in her sleep. She felt nothing and everyone else was asleep so the slow growth went unnoticed.

She takes a good look at the machine noticing the other button next to the one that said Shrink

"Hmmm Grow well if that one made me shrink to the size of a bug then maybe this one will make me bigger than anything else I can think of?! I think I will like that if I'm bigger than anyone in my school maybe I'll be able to help mommy and Baloo at their job I can be a great help even around the city who knows what could happen?" Giving it one last try Molly pressed Grow on herself again still yielding no results.


"Darn this thing must be busted" she huffed kicking the device.


Suddenly it began to spark then the Grow button seemed to push itself in. Switching on and off it zapped Molly with grow 16 times then started to smoke and spark more pieces flying off before firing off 1 huge powerful Growth beam that literally push Molly backwards till she stumbled into the wall surprisingly not hurting her as the intense Grow beam zapped Mollly longer than all the other shots combined growing steadily more intense before it finally conked out and fell onto the floor in hundreds of pieces, nutts, bolts and screws.


Molly stood against the wall surprised then disappointed.

Suddenly Molly felt strange.

Suddenly she started to grow bigger at a slow pace before stopping 5 inches taller.

1353321332.title: Molly Grows to 150 Feet tall

13533213321.content:
The 150 Foot tall not so little girl resumed her trek towards the city her bare feet now actually causing noticeable yet small tremors, and leaving deep footprints with cracks around them as she walked.

Her steps covered even more ground as Balloo raced to catch up in his plan.
He was far back but he could Molly has gotten even bigger.

"Great Khan's ghost Molly is even bigger now!"


Molly for her part was starting to enjoy herself for the time being.
She soon reached the outskirts of the city.
People felt the ground shake and her loud booms.
It wasn't long before they noticed the source.



Panic started to ensue as the first few onlookers fled.


"It's okay everyone I don't want to hurt anyone I just want to explore" Molly tried to reason the inhabitants. Unfortunately her pleas went ignored amidst the panic.

Molly carefully tiptoed down the street somehow valiantly avoiding massive property damage aside from the cracks and small craters even her toes put into the road.


A few blocks into the city Molly soon found the buildings getting larger. This wouldn't of been so bad until a grim to her realization struck.



"Hey these buildings they are still bigger than me! I-I'm not the biggest thing in the world yet after all. I was silly to think that. I guess technically mountains and other things on the planet would be bigger than me too?"


Molly looked at the buildings equal to and even larger than her in size some shockingly 4 times her size most being newly built Khan Industries properties. She kind of started to feel bad.


"I can't believe this how can a girl so big suddenly feel so small? I hope I grow a little more before that scientist and mommy fix that thing of his"

Then Balloo finally catches up with Molly.
He does a few fly-bys around her face trying to get her attention.


Unfortunately Molly was so busy feeling small again and self conscious that she was distracted that his maneuver had a worse result than intended.

Molly spotted the plane.

"Shoo bee! I feel small enough without you buzzing around" said Molly as she tried to swat the plane.


It took a few swats but Molly finally grazed it.
Balloo was stuck in a spinning dive but barely managed an emergency landing safely just outside of town. Unfortunately his plane already low on fuel had now sprung a fuel leak.


Molly meanwhile was back to feeling small but wishing and hoping she could be bigger.

She then started to cry a bit as she stared at her reflection on an office building 4 1/2 times her current size. Her tears were the size of soccer balls.

**sniff**

"Look at me. I know I'm big but I'm not the biggest **sniff** there's still so many buildings and other things bigger than me. **sniff** if I'm not the smallest like before I would rather be the biggest big ever. I'm not out to take over the universe or anything. Being big feels good. Being big is fun and interesting. Growing is fun , neat and interesting.**Sniff** I'm just curious and yet **sniff** it's no fair that these buildings are bigger than me. It's like I'm the smallest in my class all over again or like mommy saying I'm **sniff** too little or Kitt and Balloo calling me shortstuff."


She looked at her reflection again.

"I just want to be **sniff*** bigger the biggest thing ever **sniff** and have fun. I swear I don't wanna hurt nuffin or no one! **sniff** I'm just curious and I like being big **sniff**


Suddenly Molly began just crying having no more words.


A very small few of the panicked crowds while still in fear moreso now from her tears being like rain actually felt for the girl of for no other reason than her likening her situation to 1 of having been bullied in school and she was clearly a sad child albeit a very gigantic one.



After several more minutes of this Molly felt the strange feeling return and stopped crying mostly.



"Huh? What? T-This feeling it's back" she said excited and curious. Molly was just starting to figure out and realize that she seemed to grow when this feeling happened.


The feeling started to spread and grow stronger.
Suddenly Molly felt and noticed based on the taller buildings clustered near her that she was starting to grow again . Bigger and bigger the formerly 150 foot girl grew.


Although she still didn't outgrow all the buildings or become the "biggest thing ever" yet with even this spurt.


Molly did however grow and grow until she was ??? Feet tall...
13533213321.title: She takes her first steps into the City

1353321333.content:
"H-Hey I feel funny" said Molly.


She took a few more steps trying to shake of the feeling but it was no use.
She was halfway to the city from the lab and Higher For Hire.


"What is this feeling"


Suddenly she got her answer. Molly began to grow once more.



"Huh? Oh boy I'm getting bigger again! Those extra shots musta really helped"


Bigger and bigger Molly swelled, and grew reaching higher and higher into the sky.

100 feet... 120... 140... 160...

Molly couldn't believe it she had already more than doubled in size in just 5 minutes and was still growing. She decided to walk as she grew. Turning her focus back on the city she resumed her walk this time more leisurely, growing and covering more ground with every few steps and leaving bigger deeper footprints.


180 Feet.... 200... 220... 240... 260... 280..300

Molly was now 4x her 1st growth spurts size and still growing. Also now well over 100x normal size.

320... 340... 360... 380... 400... 420...

"Wow will this spurt ever end" asked Molly enjoying this thoroughly. The feel, idea, thought and experience of growing and being big were amazing, fun and curious. She had no ill will or intent presently but she did start thinking.


440... 460... 480... 500

Finally her growth started to slow

510... 520.. 530.... 540

At last Molly came to a stop at 550 Feet tall
Nearly as tall as Khan's 2 tallest buildings.


"Wow this is so neat! I can't believe how big I got! At this rate I hope I keep getting bigger. I think I might like becoming the biggest thing on earth maybe even bigger than the earth or the biggest thing to ever exist anywhere" said Molly excitedly.



Of course being so young she was blissfully ignorant and unaware to the implications of this wish nonetheless it may very well come to be so.



The machine, its effects and exposure she's had after all won't magically not affect her just cause she's young and naive.



The only hope for all is that hopefully she remains as careful and seemingly gentle as she has been thus far
