14.title: Curious Child options ( finding it )

144.content:
Liz is an average height 8 year old at just under 4' tall, on her way home from school, she had a bad day because the boys were all bullying her for being too quiet, even the teachers had a tendency to get spooked by her, due to her meek nature.



Right around the corner from her house she noticed something lodged into the hedges at her neighbours, it was a small device that wasn't too dissimilar to a water pistol, but when she picked it up it definitely weighed more than one. there was a switch on the side like a small toggle reading (R) and (E), and it was currently set to (R) there was also a knob that ranged from 10-300, but it had been pushed past the 300 mark and seemingly broken there in place. Liz was investigating the weird device, played with the toggles a few times, and when she tried to use the knob the device began to become very hot and Liz dropped it on the ground, as it hit the ground it shattered into many pieces, most of which were warped and damaged by the intense heat, and it emitted a bright green flash that blinded Liz for a minute.




She looked around and saw that nobody had seen her touch the device and she could just walk home free of any blame for breaking it, and swept it into the bushes. Her evening went by fairly uneventfully, and she measured herself on her wall like she did every night and every morning. 4' this evening, she gained a centimeter since this morning. She got excited and could hardly sleep, but managed to get a good nights sleep after a good hour of excitement.




The next morning she awoke, and was more ravenous than she had ever been before in her life, so she skipped measuring herself and went right to breakfast, during which she could not stop talking about how she had grown, her parents had never been more excited to see a school bus.



After getting home from school that day she was feeling as if her clothes had gotten tighter throughout the day, when she went into her room to change she realized that her previous measurement on the wall was now at eye level, she remeasured herself and found that she was now 4' 5", and not only that, she felt as if her breasts were beginning to develop, but almost didn't know what to make of it at the time.


Liz's parents were out for the night so her aunt was babysitting, which meant she would plant herself on the couch and listen for any noises. So Liz stayed in her room for the majority of the night, while frequently running to the kitchen for snacks. When she ultimately got full, she was exhausted and passed out in her bed.




When she awoke the next day her feet were over the edge of her bed,and further more, she definitely noticed ever so slight chest development, not even close to A cup but certainly no longer as flat as a board.




She went to her measurement station and saw that she was now 5'10" and in her mirror she saw that she had changed proportions a bit through the night. She was more slender.



She knew that she couldn't let her parents see her like this and snuck out the window wearing the baggiest article of clothing she owned. She skipped school and by midday she had to sneak into the mall and find new clothes that would cover her changing frame. In the mall the baggy shirt was now barely covering her hips, and she was constantly tugging it downward.




She was drawing a lot of attention to herself, She found her way to the Big and tall store and asked to be measured for fitting clothes, the saleswoman had to turn her away, as they didn't have clothes for people over 8 feet tall.



"I'm not eight feet tall!" said Liz as the shirt she was struggling to keep down finally tore, revealing her still not A cup but certainly bigger than this morning chest.



"I have you measured at 8'6"! and if you could please contain yourself you are scaring off our clients!" said the shopkeep, but Liz looked around at the hordes of gawking men and begged to differ.

She knew exactly what was causing this, and started heading back to her neighbours house. On her way she...



( moderation note - Edited 1/29/17 at 4:57 AM
Please keep proportions reasonable and don't overdo the breast thing thing please. )

"No!! I can't be this tiny. I didn't want this." The poor teeny girl huddled into the fetal position and cried her tears.

Liz looked up and saw the shadow of a police officer. Except this police officer was the size of a skyscraper to the shrunken girl.

She was in such awe of the giant cop that she even forgot her nakedness.

The officers name was Carter McDrake. He was 46 years old slightly overweight with a mustache and shaved head. He was patrolling because he heard reports of a giant naked girl in the neighborhood

“No giant girls around here.” He said but then he looked at his feet and saw a tiny pink creature moving
“What in San Hill is this”

Although scared Liz let the giant cop pick up her tiny body.

“Well I’ll be damned. It’s a tiny girl. Can’t be more than 9 years old. What’s your name little miss?”

“I’m Liz. I Accidentally became a giant and I tried to fix myself but now I’m too small. Can you please help me”

The officer scanned Liz’s small form

“What happened to your clothes, kid?”

“I grew out of them... when I was a giant.”

The big cop itched his thick mustache

“Sir, I’m really scared I don’t wanna be tiny anymore. I just wanna go home!”

The officer decides to...
14432332.title: World’s Largest Cop

choices: Call the precinct and explain the situation

144323321.content:
"Now don't you go worryin' your pretty little head about nothin' little miss... No pun intended. Officer Carter McDrake will see to it we getcha fixed right up." He explained with a small smile tugging at his lips. "Now how's about you tell me how all this happened."

Liz felt relieved, someone was willing to help her. She smiled up at the mustached officer from her perch on his palm and began to explain everything from finding the device, to breaking it, to growing taller, all the way to becoming a 9ft amazon to the 3inch bug she was right now.

To say Officer McDrake was stunned would be an understatement. If wasn't holding the 3inch girl in his hands right now he would've just assumed she had a real active imagination. Either that or she was crazy. It wouldn't be the first time a child told him something crazy. His nephew Brian came to mind.

Shaking off these thoughts he went back to address the little girl in his palm. "That's one heck of story there Liz. If I had heard it from anyone else I'd of called them crazy. But I know for a fat you ain't lying." he then turned his attention to the glowing stone on the ground by his foot. "So this is the little culprit, huh? Looks like something out those alien movies grandad used to watch."

"Uh huh." Liz confirmed as she too stared down at the glowing rock that caused her so much trouble. Officer McDrake knelt down to examine the stone closer. There was still a faint emerald glow around it that seemed to be flickering. It was as if the thing was alive... Pulsing. A childish and primitive part of him wanted to touch, but the more ration adult part of him stopped himself from doing so.

Considering what happened to Liz, the last thing he wanted was to become tiny. Who help 'HIM' then? Liz sure couldn't. And what would happen if someone with less noble intentions found them. He shuddered at the thought. The best thing to do would be to call this one in and have the precinct take a look. Get one of them fancy scientist types to fly out here.

That sounded good. If no one believed him he had living proof in his hand. But then again all those science movies taught him one thing. Scientist like to experiment. What if they see Liz as nothing more than a lab rat and cut her open to see what makes her tick? He couldn't subject her to that. Although the idea of a tiny girl running a hamster wheel was pretty funny.

Maybe he should consider other options? Maybe he should try asking Liz to touch the stone again. If it shrunk her then maybe it could grow her back. It grew her once already. It was worth a shot, wasn't it? Or was that too risky? Damn it. He didn't know what to do. Carter narrowed his eyes at the rock.

What should he do?
144323321.title: A Cop When You Need One

choices: McDrake begins shrinking smaller than Liz
The rock glows causing Liz to outgrow her prison
144323322.content:
"Don't you worry little lady. Officer McDrake will keep you safe." He smiled.

"Really?" Liz dared ask.

Never once did the officer lose his friendly smile. "Absolutely. If you can't trust the police, then who can you trust?"

Liz nodded. In her mind that made sense. Police saved people all the time. Like that time on T.V where the police stopped those masked men from robbing the bank.

"Now how about you tell me how all this happened?" McDrake asked calmly.

Feeling at ease. Liz began to explain about the strange glowing rock that made her grow and shrink. Carter absorbed her every word as she continued to speak she had no idea the affects her words were having on him. Carter McDrake might've been a cop but that didn't necessarily make him a good one. Any chance to break out and rise above his station was good, and now Liz had just given him a great way how.

"And that's how I got so tiny." Liz finished.

"I see." Carter said with mock sincerity. "That little glowing rock's caused you so much trouble."

Liz nodded, completely unaware of the danger.

Carter reached into his pocket and pulled out a pack of cigarette. He popped them open to reveal he had only three left... and a whole lot of room. Liz looked down at the pack and frowned. Smoking was bad. Her mother and father said so. "Smoking is bad for you. It can make your teeth fall out."

"You're right little miss Liz. It's a filthy habit and I forget at times. I think I just need someone to remind me." McDrake said plainly. "Do you think you can do that?"

Liz smiled. "Okay."

"Great!" Carter grinned before dropping her into the open cigarette pack. Liz it the bottom with a thud as she surrounded on all sides by cardboard and death sticks.

"What are you doing!" she cried.

"You said you'd remind me when I forgot smoking was bad. How can you do that if you're not with me?"

"B-but..."

"No buts miss Liz." McDrake scolded. "You'll be my permanent reminder while I figure out how that damn rock works!"

"What!?"

"Thank you miss Liz. I've been so bored for so long. Being a cop sucks. Uphold the law, protect the people, file those papers, loose some damn weight! I've had it! I didn't become a cop to protect people. I became a cop to carry a gun in public and gain the respect that came with the badge. Instead people look at me and see another blue grunt. No more! With that crazy rock I'll finally be able to gain some respect!"

Liz couldn't believe her ears. This man was crazy. That couldn't be right... he was a cop. Are all cops secretly crazy? Before she could ponder that thought further, her world went dark as McDrake shut the pack and stuffed it back into his pocket.

"Sit tight. I'll need a guinea pig for this rock later." McDrake then dug into his other pocket and pulled out a set of tweezers. He knelt down and plucked the rock from the ground before tacking off a sock and dropping it inside. With his prize secure and his captive safely tucked away, McDrake grinned ferally at the clear blue sky.

Oh the fun he would have.

buying extra tweezers and other stuff.

the town and he was single so he’d be free
from distractions and onlookers.

captive slash guinea pig useful.
McDrake is was never a believer in karma
and was so blinded by ambitions he never

you’re about to help me little missy.

McDrake then carefully took some tweezers
and grabbed the glowing object with
one pair and Liz’s arm with the other.

intense than Liz had seen previously.

she said trying to wipe away her blurred vision.

something tells him Liz isn’t exactly going

Then it hit her.

Next____
1443233223.title: Reader's Choice

choices: Liz crushes McDrake and goes on a rampage
Liz stores McDrake for safe keeping and drinks from the lake
14432332231.content:
McDrake had gone white as ghost. He needed to get away before the giant girl noticed him and decided to crush him flat. Slowly he made his way to his feet and began to run. To where he didn't know, but anywhere was better than on the giant girl's body.

Unfortunately for him, his rapid movement had an undesired affect. High above him, Liz started to feel a slight itching sensation on her leg. Peering down she could see what appeared to be a little speck on the move. She initially thought it was just a bug, but then remembered her situation.

Mean old McDrake made her touch that weird rock again. Their was bright light and then his house was gone and there were mini trees everywhere. The it all finally dawned on her. The tree's weren't mini, she was big. That's why she felt off. The rock made her grow again.

McDrake's house was gone because she was sitting on it. If that was true then... the ''bug'' on her leg was actually...?

Liz narrowed her eyes and brought her finger up to her mouth. She gave it a good lick before bringing down towards the speck. McDrake for his part was pretty much out of breath. He didn't know how long he'd been running, but it was clear as day he barely made any headway.

He hunched over for a second to catch his breath and then noticed a dark shadow consume him. Nervously he looked up to see the mega skyscraper sized index finger of Liz headed straight for him. McDrake let out a shriek reminiscent of Janet Leigh before taking off with renewed vigor.

Adrenaline surged through his body as he ran. He ran so fast it reminded him of his days as a rookie in the academy. Too bad for him though that speed didn't beat size, and He was compressed against the slick skin of Liz's finger and the smooth skin of her leg.

The pressure was immense. He imagined this is what it would feel like to be trapped in a trash compactor. How he wasn't a mere bloodstain on the giantess' leg was a mystery. He then felt a brief moment of relief as the pressure lessened. Liz was finally letting up.

That relief soon died however as he felt his body moving up with her finger. The saliva was acting as an adhesive, try as he may to break free he just couldn't. To think he was so small compared to the giantess that spit alone was stronger than him. That was a serious blow to his pride.

He then felt ill as he ascended into the air. He hated flying, he hated heights, he hated just not being on the ground in general. He suffering would only continue when he was face to face with Liz enormous pupil. It too dwarfed him in size. He struggled more furiously now as it narrowed. She was confirming something and it made him feel even more ill when he realized why.

She was confirming it was him.

"Oh no." McDrake whispered.

Liz continued to stare at him with a narrowed eye until finally she confirmed her suspicions. She'd found mean old McDrake. "I found you, you big meanie!"

Carter actually wet himself. "I'm sorry! I'll fix this! I'll do anything you want! Just please, don't hurt me!"

Liz could barely hear him at all. Anything he said was a barely audible squeak in her ears. All she knew was she was mad and found the person responsible. He'd get no mercy from her.

144323322311.title: Liz crushes McDrake and goes on a rampage

1443233223113.content:
Within her fury Liz found clarity. Dealing with Carter was so easy, all it took was her pressing her fingers together. Dealing with her problems had never been so easy before. The more she thought about it, why did she want to go back to being a little runt anyways? At her size she could teach anybody a lesson. Especially those bullies at her school.

That sounded good. In fact, that sounded very good. With that in mind, Liz stood at her full height of 235ft and marveled at her new stature. She had to be the biggest person in the world. No one else was as big as her. That meant nobody could stop her. Liz looked down at a small tree before ripping it out of the ground with very little effort. It was practically weightless in her hand.

She smirked to herself before looking off in the distance and spying the city. That was her home, and where her targets would be. She tossed the tree and took her first step. The ground trembled as she did, leaving behind an enormous footprint. Each step was a rhythm of mini earthquakes.

She'd reach the city in no time at all. The only thing she had to think about was which bully to introduce herself to first. There was Megan Price who's father was the principle of her school and always looked the other way when Megan and her friends bullied her or anyone else. That girl made her blood boil. She was probably staying after school.

Another person that came to mind was her big sister's ex-boyfriend Ricky. That guy was a jerk. Whenever he was around he would always call her short and barrow money from her sister. She hated him for breaking her big sis's heart and cheating on her with another girl. She hated him with a passion. Maybe she should go after him first.

There were sure, but those two stood out. Who did she go after first?

14432332231132.title: Liz goes after Ricky first at the brewery

choices: Beth has Liz shove Ricky in her mouth
Beth still loves Ricky and doesn't want him hurt
144323322311321.content:
Beth sat in the garage working on her bike. In a few more hours her new motorcycle would be ready to go. It took a lot of money, sweat, and hard work, but it would finally be done. She was so engrossed in her work she almost didn't hear her mom, Sable enter.

"Beth!? BETH!?" Sable called repeatedly.

Beth turned to address the woman. "Yeah?"

"Have you seen your sister? The bus came back a little while ago and I'm starting to get worried. I couldn't reach the school either." Sable explained.

Beth wasn't worried though. "I'm sure she's fine. The last this happened she just stayed after school with Daphne, remember? I'm sure the two of them are just sitting on the bleachers talking about how boys are icky."

That made Sable laugh, but it did little to completely curb her worry. "You're probably right. But it would still be nice to get some confirmation just to be sure."

"Trust me. The half pints just fine." Beth waved off.

"Now you know she's sensitive about her height, Beth. She won't be small forever you know."

"Yeah, yeah. The grow up so fast." Beth teased. Sable sighed. She could still remember a time when Beth was younger and would pester her to measure how much she grew. The memory brought a smile to her face. Those were good times.

Sable then turned her attention to the two-wheeler her eldest daughter was working on. "I see you're almost finished with your bike."

"Yep." Beth smiled with pride. "In just a few more hours I'll be able to takes this bad boy for a joyride."

"That's good. It's nice to see you working on it again since..." Sable trailed off.

Beth crossed her arms in annoyance. "What? Since Ricky? I told you I am so over him." Beth was about to take a swig water from a nearby cup before she noticed something odd. The water's surface was... shimmering? "Huh?"

"What is it?" Sable asked.

"Do you... hear that?"

The two listen carefully and hear what sounded like a series of car alarms. What followed next was a loud boom that shook the ground. Sable steadied herself against the wall while Beth fell out of her chair. Her Bike was the next thing to topple over, much to her horror. "My bike!"

The earthquakes didn't let up and continued one after another. There was a pattern. A rhythm. That wasn't right. Eventually there was one more loud boom. It shook the garage, their home, everything. They could've sworn they heard glass shatter inside.

"Beth! Are you alright!?" Sable asked frantically as she helped her eldest back to her feet.

"Yeah. I'm alright. But my bike." she whispered. It was scratched up now and she hadn't even broken it in yet.

"What was that?"

"Dunno know. But I'm going to find out." Beth huffed as she reached into her back pocket and pulled out the garage remote. She clicked the button and watched as the garage door slowly raised up. What she and Sable saw next left them wide eyed.

"Is that...?"

"A giant foot?" Sable finished.

Slowly both women walked outside to get a better view and this time their jaws hit the floor. "Oh my."

"L-Liz?" Beth stuttered.

"Hi-ya!" she waved. Both Beth and Sable were stunned.

"Wha!? How?"

"What... the hell! What happened to you!?" Beth finally shouted up.

"I grew up." Liz smiled as she knelt down. "Little sis."

"My poor baby." Sable said before promptly passing out.

"Is she gonna be okay?" Liz worried.

Beth shrugged. "Probably. Sooo… Care to explain... All this?"

Liz smiled. "Later. But first I brought you a present."

Beth was confused by this. She could only stand idle as Liz knelt down closer and placed one finger on her nostril. She then took a deep breath, and sneezed. What followed was both the coolest and grossest thing Beth had ever seen. Out shout a fountain of snot and what appeared to be rock sized boogers...It was a sight she certainly wouldn't forget, and was that pile mucus groaning!?

Looking closer she could make out a head of disheveled and slimy brown hair and an all too familiar scruffy face. Was that... Ricky!? More importantly... did Liz just blow him out her nose!?

Liz now sat criss-cross, "Ta-da!"
144323322311321.title: Family Reunion!

choices: Beth has Liz torture him another way
1443233223113211.content:
Beth looked down at the mucus coated man with mild annoyance. Whatever he did to earn her giant sister's ire and get blown out her nose was probably well deserved. Served him right for cheating on her. "Why'd you bring him here?"

"He owed you a lot of money and an apology. So I decided to bring him to you. What happens next is up to you." Liz explained as she watched the groggy man groan in discomfort. Her nose must've done a real number on him.

Beth placed a hand to her chin in thought. Liz had a point, Ricky never did apologize after he cheated on her, and he did owe her a shit ton of money. He owed her over a thousand dollars to be exact. Money she was saving for her bike.

"So? What do you want to do with him?" Liz asked curiously. Looking up at her "big" sister. Beth could tell she was hoping she'd let her punish him. A part of her wanted to just let Liz do whatever she wanted to Ricky and be done with it. But she was a fair woman. Ricky's fate would be in his own hands.

"That depends on him." Beth answered. Ricky's groans of pain seemed to finally die down and he seemed to finally be coming to. The first thing he did was try to wipe the snot from his face, but all he managed to do was smear it. Watching him try and fail to get clean was actually kind of funny.

Ricky finally shook off the cobwebs and began to take in his surroundings. The first thing that caught his attention outside of being drenched in some bizarre slime was the fact he was no longer at the brewery. He was in front of Beth's house. Beth's house!? Had he been drinking again? Was he drunk right now? It would certainly explain that weird dream he had.

"Oh Ricky." Beth called. Said man turned his attention to the voice. Standing a little off to the side was none other than Beth herself... and was that Mrs. Sable on the ground? "Hello. Earth to Ricky. Come in Ricky."

"Beth? What am I doing out here?" He asked confusedly. Beth simply giggled at his question. He didn't see what was so funny right now. Clearly there was a joke here that he was missing. Before he could ask further, Beth continued.

"You don't remember?"

"Remember what?" Ricky asked as he sat up. "Seriously what the hell was this slime?" He whispered to himself.

"Hmm. Remember my sister, Liz? She brought you here after she found you at the Brewery." Beth filled in.

Ricky raised an eyebrow. "The pipsqueak?"

Beth smiled. "Oh I'd be careful with the nicknames if I were you. She might not look it but she can hold one hell of a grudge."

Ricky rolled his eyes. "Ha. Like I'm afraid of Lint Sized Lizzy."

"Ahem!" Came a voice from behind. A much louder and higher voice.

"Shouldn't have said that." said Beth.

Ricky turned his head to the sound and what he saw left him as pale as a sheet. It was Liz. A very, very, big Liz. It wasn't dream. It wasn't... a dream! That meant he really was in her... Ricky felt sick. This slime was actually snot. He was both grossed out and he scared. Mostly scared.

Ricky gulped. "H-hey there, Liz. Y-you look good. Have you lost weight?"

Liz eyes narrowed. "Are you saying I'm fate!?

"N-no! I uh..." Ricky just couldn't get the words out. He was just way too freaked out.

"You owe my sister an apology! Say you're sorry!" Liz ordered.

"I'm sorry!" Ricky shouted to Beth. His Apology was met with Slamming her hand down beside him, nearly flattening him. Ricky was curled into a ball now.

"For!" Liz added.

"I'm sorry for cheating on you! I'm sorry for being a jerk! I'm sorry for borrowing money! Oh god!" Ricky cried.

"Hmph!"

Beth was loving this. "It's nice to know you're sorry, Ricky. Now, about that money you owe me. If I remember correct you owe me a little over a thousand dollars."

"A-a thousand." Rick parroted. He honestly forgot how much he owed Beth, not that he ever planned on paying back. But now he was kind of in a bad way. He didn't have that kind of money. Hence why his new girlfriend Monica got him a job at her dad's brewery. "I-I don't have that kind of money!"

"Oooh! Tough break." Beth feigned pity. "Debt's never a good thing to have, Ricky. Are you saying you can't pay me back?"

Ricky was trembling now. He really couldn't pay her back and he probably couldn't weasel his way out either. With Beth's sister as a giant monster there was no escape. She'd turn him into a smear on the pavement. He had to try and get out of this. "I-I can't! At least not yet! B-but I can get it to you soon..."

"Tut-tut-tut. That won't do. Con me like aren't known for your word. After all you told me you'd pay me back months ago and then ghosted on me. Either you pay now, or we'll discuss another form of payment."

Liz grinned.

"Ricky didn't like the sound of that. But this other form of payment might be his only option. "What other form of payment?"

Beth's grin matched Liz's. "Liz."

Ricky didn't even have time to react before he was plucked from the ground bi Lizzilla. "H-hey! Hey! Put me down!"

"You obviously can't pay me back and you're obviously trying to stall for time, so let's discuss the other form of payment." Beth explained. "You'll pay me back with your life. Your ass belongs to me now."

Ricky's jaw dropped while Liz giggled.

"Liz? Do me a solid."

"Sure." The giantess nodded.

"Stuff in you mouth." Beth ordered.

Ricky's eyes went wide. "No. Nononononononononono!

"You heard the lady." Liz smiled.

"No! I'm sorry! Please!"

Those were Ricky's final please, before he was stuffed into the darkness.

144323322311321131.content:
Beth smiled, despite her little sis becoming a giant, she was still really sweet. "Alright then. I hereby officially apology for all the short jokes I've made about you over the years."

"Really?" Liz asked happily.

Beth never once lost her smile. "Yeah. Besides, I can't really make any short jokes about you now considering you're taller than the house."

Liz blushed slightly. "Thanks... shorty."

Beth's eye twitched. "Don't push it. You may be bigger, but I'm still older."

"Yeah, yeah." Liz waved off. Her sister being older didn't mean much to her in the grand scheme of things, she was still bigger and stronger.

"So! You finally gonna tell me how you got so big in the first place?"

Liz thought it over for a minute before giving her sister a friendly grin. "Nope."

Beth groaned. "Dude, seriously? Come on."

"Nope!" Liz answered.

Beth sighed. "Fine, don't tell me. Anyway, before we go out our little revenge spree, we should probably help mom back inside."

"Leave it to me!" Liz saluted. Beth watched in awe as her sister reached over to their house and casually tore off the roof. Had Liz not been her sister, Beth would've been scared shitless at how strong the girl was. She gently put down the roof before just as gently plucking the unconscious woman from the ground. Liz carefully placed Sable in her bedroom on the bed before putting the roof back in place. It was slightly crooked, but Beth couldn't help but be amazed.

"Woah." Was all she could get out.

Liz smirked. "I know, right? I'm the strongest their is."

"No shit."

The giantess giggled. "So. Who do you have in mind?"

That was a good question. Who did she have a bone to pick with? There were quite a few people, but two names instantly came to mind. One was the skank that Ricky left her for, Monica. The woman was a bitch, and not a fun one either. She'd even took the time to rub it in her face that she took her boyfriend away. God she hated her. After what Liz did she was probably back at the brewery looking for Ricky and trying to figure out what the hell happened.

The other name that stood out was her mom's boss Mr. Kazama. That big wig CEO really got under skin. She never told anyone but the man and her had dated briefly after Ricky betrayed her. It was nice for a while, but he wanted a lot more than she was willing to give, so she broke things off. He didn't take to kindly to that and started piling more work on their mom's shoulder's and kept her till the wee hours of the morning.

Those two were prime targets in her eyes.

Beth thought it all over and decided...

It wasn’t a nightmare!
Oh my god oh my god oh my god
Please don’t hurt me”


“I’m leaving that part up to Beth”

“Ha imagine big bad Ricky afraid of
a little girl! This is priceless! Maybe it’s better
our relationship ended after all”


“Little? Little? Are you fuckin kidding?
Your evil sis her is huge? Bigger than
Godzilla”


Liz puffed out her chest in pride
“Yea and don’t you forget it shorty”

It was odd seeing a giant child stick
out her chest and act proud followed
by looking like the preverbal cat that caught
the canary.


Beth knew crazy as it was forget cloud 9
Liz was probably on cloud 999.

“Well you’re in luck Ricky I won’t have
Liz do anything more to you right now
but consider this an ultimatum.
Next time you see Liz and me it’ll be to
start collecting on them debts you owe me”


Ricky groaned.
The sisters watched him leave.
Sable then groaned as she woke up.

“I just had a crazy dream!
Your sister had gotten huge and and
Oh my good heavens my baby girl!”
1443233223113213.title: Reader's Choice

choices: Monica puts a bounty on Liz and Beth's heads
14432332231132131.content:
Beth and Liz watched as Sable again passed out from the shock. Honestly this was starting to become more comical than it was serious. It would seem the older woman just couldn't handle anything out of the ordinary.

Beth giggled before lifting Sable bridal style. "Liz? You wait out here while I bring her inside."

"Okay." Liz shrugged. There wasn't really much she could do here! It wasn't as if she could fit in the house anymore. That was kind of disappointing actually.

Beth smiled at her sister as she walked their mother inside. All of this was just too much for the poor woman. As Beth made her way into the main house she noticed the fallen frames and overturned furniture. Liz's new size sure did a number on the place. Thankfully the long couch was untouched.

"That'll work." Beth whispered before lying her mother down. "You rest now."

She couldn't help but smile at Sable's sleeping form before giving her a kiss on the forehead. Hopefully everything would work itself out by the time she woke up. For now though, Beth had a little/big sister to deal with.

Meanwhile back at the brewery the owner's daughter Monica was trying to piece together what happened from the employees and nearby civilians. Long story short, the redhead was not happy. What she heard sounded like utter nonsense... and yet, the story was consistent across the board.

"Giant women. How Ludacris" Monica scoffed.

She was about to have herself a free drink at the bar when suddenly she heard a familiar voice call her. "Babe."

Instantly she turned around and winced at the sight of her snot covered boyfriend. "What the hell happened to you!?"

"You wouldn't believe me if I told you." Ricky explained.

"Let me guess. Giant women?" Monica said plainly.

Ricky's eyes widened. "So you know then."

"So it's true then?" Monica asked, still not fully believing this story. It was only after Ricky nodded did she finally put some actually thought into the tale. "Tell me more."

Ricky then went on to explain how he'd been kidnapped by his ex's giant monster of a little sister, which only served to piss Monica off. She hated Beth. She hated her like Eagles' fans hated Giants' fans. He then proceeded to reluctantly tell her how Liz stuffed him up her nose and blew him out on the pavement. Monica was grateful she hadn't eaten recently.

It all culminated with Ricky telling her how they let him go and the next they saw him it would be to collect some debts. That last part made Monica's blood boil. Who the hell were Beth and her freakshow of a sister to demand things from Ricky? He belonged to her. He was her property and demanding things from him was like demanding things from her. This would not stand.

"Come with me, Ricky." Monica said coolly.

The defeated man sighed before following. "Where are we going."

Monica grinned. "To call in a few favors."
14432332231132131.title: Shaking Things Up

choices: Liz and Beth are attacked by people out for the bounty
Ricky thinks Monica has gone too far and tries to warn the sisters
144323322311321311.content:
Monica led Ricky to the back of the brewery and into the cellar. Ricky hated this part of the building as it was cold and dark. There was nothing down here except more booze than he knew what to do with and poor lighting. Not to mention the walls would occasionally ooze green slime. God he hated slime.

"Remind me again why where, babe?"

Monica simply rolled her eyes. "I said we're going to call in a few favors. Now just fallow me, okay?"

Ricky sighed and did as he was told. He didn't really get any of this, all he knew for certain is he wanted a shower. And maybe and some Scotch. Eventually the pair came to a stop at a large brown box labeled Bud Light.

"Move that for me." Monica ordered. Ricky certainly wasn't in the mood to move anything, but he complied none the less. It took some effort, but he was able to slide the box over. What he saw next left him confused. A black hatch on the floor? What was this, some sort of secret lair?

"Monica...?" Ricky started.

"Thanks babe." She cut off before opening up the hatch. All Ricky could see was the start of a ladder leading into the darkness. Just how deep was this hole? And how long had it been here? To answer at least the first question, he walked up to the hole and dropped a wad of spit.

He didn't even here a splat.

Monica merely looked unamused. "Nice. Now come on."

The duo traveled down seemingly bottomless hole until they finally reached the ground. Ricky was surprised by what he saw. It appeared to be an office. In fact it looked like Tony Montana's office in Scareface. This was awesome! But it still begged the question. "Why is there a mafioso style office under the brewery?"

"My father does more than get people drunk, Ricky." Monica answered before taking a seat behind the desk. She loved how comfy the big chair was, real alligator butt. She twirled around for a moment before she set her sights on the phone. "Tell me Ricky? How would you like a chance to pay back Lizzy and Beth for all the trouble they've caused you?"

Ricky seemed confused for a moment. Him? Get back at them? "Me? Get back at them? I'd kill for the chance!"

Monica nodded. "That's all I needed to hear." She then picked up the phone before dialing a number. The phone rang for a bit until finally an elderly voice answered on the other end.

"Jeramiah? Is that you?" The voice asked.

"No. This is Monica."

"Monica? How are you? It's been too long. I haven't seen you since you were four years old." The elderly man said happily. "So what do I owe the pleasure of this call?"

The redhead giggled slightly. "Business. The only problem is I don't think you'll believe me." she finished seriously.

"Try me." The elderly man challenged.

"Alright." She started. "A girl the literal size of Godzilla and her sister are giving my boyfriend trouble, which means they're giving me trouble. I want to put up a bounty, dead or alive... Say, one-billion dollars."

There was silence on the other end as if the mans eyes were bugging out. Even Ricky's eyes were bugging out. After another minute, the elderly man returned. "Are you serious?"

"As a heart attack." Monica answered without missing a beat.

There was a cough on the other end. "Very well. I'll put the bounty through. Who are the targets?"

"Liz and Beth Archer."

"Understood. Anything else. Time limit or anything else like that." The elderly man sked.

"No. Just keep my name out of it."

"Alright. I'll set everything up. Take it easy Monica."

"You was well." she finished before hanging up. "Everything's in place."

Ricky was stunned. "Babe?"

choices: Liz decides to use her new size to do whatever she wants

Liz uses her size to get payback
1443233223123.content:
After drinking her fill of fresh lake water, Liz began to look her reflection over in the stream. Seeing herself as 235ft giant was strange. She often had dreams of what it would be like to big and strong and now that dream had become reality, just not in the way she expected.

Honestly she should be freaking out right about now. Being a 9ft amazon practically scared her and yet becoming a living breathing giantess didn't. She was the biggest and strongest now and that was something she liked. She could rip up trees with ease, walk anywhere she wanted in a matter of minutes, and was so big she could practically do whatever she wanted and nothing could stop her.

The more she thought about it, the less Liz wanted to return to normal. Sure there were a few cons like no clothes and fitting in a normal house, but she could manage. Besides, she didn't even know where that glowing rock went after mean old McDrake made her touch it. For all she knew it was gone forever. No rock meant no cure.

Oh well. Speaking of McDrake, she would have to deal with him eventually. He couldn't just sit in her ear forever. Or could he? It would certainly be a fitting punishment considering he trapped her in a cigarette box, kidnapped her, and turned her into a giant. Then again she wasn't really mad about being turned into a giant anymore. She was actually starting to like it. Maybe she'd just leave him alone for now? Just as long as he stays quiet and doesn't get on her nerves.

Liz hummed before standing at her full height once again. Looking around she spotted the city off in the distance. At her size she could get there in a matter of minutes. She took her first step and flattened a few trees underfoot. They didn't hurt, not in the slightest, he skin was just too thick. She continued her trek with ground trembling beneath her, large footprints being the aftermath of her footfalls.

The newly minted giantess still hadn't decided how she wanted to use her size. She could either use it to do whatever she wanted considering nothing could stop her. Or she could use it to get payback on everyone that's ever done her wrong. Either way someone or something was going experience her new size up close and personal.

The only question now though was, how to use her size.

14432332231234.title: Readers choice

choices: Liz makes it home with no trouble
Liz takes one more drink from the lake and grows some more
144323322312343.content:
"I think I should go home first and show mammy and big sis." Liz said to herself. She needed to let her mom and sister know what happened to her. School was probably out by now and they must be worried. With that in mind, Liz was about to set off... Only to realize she had no idea how to get home.

Officer McDrake brought her out here in a cigarette box so she couldn't see anything. She needed help. There were no phone books she could use and she didn't own a cellphone. That meant she had no way to get back home... Unless? Liz scrunched up her face. She had to ask HIM.

She really didn't want to, but had no choice. "Hey meanie!?" she called as she patted her ear. "Can you hear me in there!?"

Inside her ear, Carter could hear her quite well. He just wished she'd stop patting her ear and rattling him. If it weren't for the fact that he was trapped from the neck down in earwax, he probably be bounced off the walls. "Y-yes! I can hear you! Just stop shaking me, will ya!?"

Liz didn't like his tone a pat her ear twice as hard to let him know it.

Carter was not a happy camper. "Alright! I get it! I'm sorry for whatever I said!?"

Liz finally stopped before letting out an annoyed huff. "I'm going home. But I need your help. I don't know where I am."

Carter froze for a second as he took in the giantess's words. She was actually asking help? To be more precise... She was asking him for help!? It was at this point Carter ignored the potential danger and began to laugh. "Y-you want my help!? You!? Hahahahahaha! Now that's rich! Hahahahahaha!"

"It's not funny!" Liz growled. "Stop laughing at me!"

"Oh it is funny, little girl. You're asking me for help. Did you forget what you did to me? I'm stuck in your ear buried in wax and you just crushed my car and destroyed my house! I'm not helping you!"

"Oh yes you are!" Liz snapped.

"No I'm not. Besides, you have nothing to offer me." Carter explained as if he were the one in control.

Liz thought his words over. "What do you want?"

"Freedom!" he said simply.

"Not happening." Liz said back. He didn't care about her freedom when the roles were reversed so she didn't care about his.

"Well too bad, kid. That's my terms and nothing you say will change them. You. Need. Me."

Liz was fuming now. He wasn't the one in control here, she was and yet he was acting like what he did to her earlier didn't matter. As much as she didn't want to admit it, he was right. She did need him, but she certainly wasn't going to cave in to his terms. She tried to think up a plan to make him listen to her, then she remembered what her big sister used to do to her to make her more agreeable.

With a sinister smirk on her face, Liz placer her index finger in her mouth. She made sure to get it as wet as possible with her tongue before pulling out. Her sister used to threaten her with this when she didn't want to do anything like chores around the house. Carter was about to get the full brunt of it.

Liz held her finger up to her ear, and drove it in deep. She shuddered a bit in disgust at how slimy it felt, but in order to get home a wet willy was a small price to pay.

Meanwhile back on the inside, Carter was in hell. All of a sudden an enormous finger entered the large cave that was Liz's ear. What frightened him the most wasn't the fact that he couldn't move, no, what frightened him the most was that the finger was covered in what he assumed was spit. It gave him horrible flashbacks to his pre-school days.

"WET WILLY!" he screamed as the finger barreled into him. The force was insane and the pain was real. How the hell was he still alive? The finger jostled him, bounced him off the walls, pinned him, soaked him, left him reeling. He felt as if he was in a giant washing machine.

Back on the outside Liz ould hear him scream as she rammed her finger deeper and deeper. She wanted to be extra sure McDrake knew who he was messing with. It still felt gross though. After another few minutes of this, she retracted her finger and found no trace of the tiny officer.

"Hey!? Are you still in there!?"

Her answer was a cough. Deep inside her ear, Carter was a mess. A saliva covered mess. He'd been beaten, battered, and rammed even deeper than he was before. His prison was now a wax and saliva fusion. This girl was a moster in his eyes. A cold blooded wet willy delivering monster. "Alright! I'll get you home, just... Don't do that again." he conceded.

Liz smiled. "Great."

1443233223123432.title: Liz takes one more drink from the lake and grow...

choices: Liz deccides to indulge and raid the ice cream factory
14432332231234321.content:
The ground beneath Liz's feet trembled with every step she took, each footfall leaving behind an imprint of her feet. At her size the she would reach the city within minutes. According to McDrake there was no way to cut through without being noticed, and truthfully Liz didn't really care at this point.

There was nothing she could do about her clothing situation so there was no use fretting over it. All she cared about was getting back home. Eventually Liz reached the city boarders, but not before unintentionally crushing the city sign underfoot. She didn't feel it, it was far too insignificant to her.

Looking at the city now at her size, it was almost like a large model. It reminded her of the model cities used in those old Kaiju movies her sister liked to watch. She took her first actual step into the city, and the ground shook. Cars swerved to avoid the giant bare foot in the middle of the road and some civilians were knocked right off their feet.

The people were both terrified and in awe. A giant woman was not something a person saw everyday, or ever. To Liz the cars on the street were reminiscent of toys and the people, ants. It was so surreal. Without even thinking she bent down to pluck one of the "toy" cars between her fingers.

The action caused the citizens to panic and the man trapped in the car to nearly release his bowels. He was soon face to face with the enormous pupil of the giant girl as she peered into the car. "It's not even heavy." she commented as she placed the car in her palm.

She rolled the car back and forth in her hand before placing it down on a nearby roof. She didn't have time for this, even if it was interesting. "Okay meanie! I'm in the city! Where to next!?"

"You're going to have to be more specific!" Carter yelled in annoyance. "Any landmarks!? What do you see!?"

Liz scowled at Carter's tone of voice but chose not to comment. Instead she opted to follow his instructions. She scanned the surrounding area of fleeing civilians and car accidents before spying a giant T.V screen that barely reached her bellybutton.

"I see a big T.V" Liz answered.

"Big T.V?" Carter whispered to himself. "You're in Towne Square right now! Walk up to the building and take a left! When you do you should see a ''Bullseye's'' at the end of the block!"

Liz nodded and walked up to the building. Each step cracked the road and shattered the pavement. The people fled in terror as the windows in the nearby buildings exploded and one or two cars were flattened by her feet. Once she reached the building she turned her head left to see the ''Bullseye's'' at the end of the block just like McDrake said.

So far he was telling the truth.

Before making her way down the block she turned her head right. What she saw made her eyes widen. It was the Ice Cream factory. Her school was supposed to take a trip there but it was cancelled due to construction. She knew she should follow Carter's directions, but the thought of putting her size to use to get free ice cream was just so tempting.

Liz bit her lip. What should she do?

144323322432.title: Anna thinks she’s in a land of toys and dolls

1443233224323.content:
Anna sang a song to herself. What kid wouldn’t be thrilled to be in a toy store where everything is free and open for play?

In the distance, she heard some chanting and cheering. Ducking behind a building, she saw what appeared to be a dozen or so Barbie dolls dancing by themselves. They wore a pretty red and black uniform and were doing twists and turns. She would love to have just one of those dollies for herself.

She needed a bag to keep them in though. Checking the building, it did have one open door. When she opened it all sorts of tiny athletic equipment spilled out. She amused herself bouncing a super ball sized basketball before returning to the task at hand.

Reaching into the room, she felt what seemed like a large silk handkerchief. It was like her daddy’s, but round and colorful. It was big enough to wrap up all those dollies so it would do. She tugged it out causing even more items to spill from the closet. Just like at home, she paid no mind to the mess she made. She was playing now.

As she was about to crawl back to her new toys, she heard some wild squeaking near her thigh. Looking over there was another toy seemingly yelling at her. The doll had a long dress and thigh high boots. It was an older doll and was nowhere as interesting as those cheerleader dollies she wanted to collect. But she supposed she needed to listen to this toy. Animated toys were fun! The doll was steadfast when Anna wrapped her fist around its middle and lifted it to her ear.

“You need to clean up this mess this instant lady and leave the school grounds. This is a high school, not the place for giant children!”

Pulling the doll away from her ear, she gave it a cross look. “You are a mean dollie. You are also ugly. I don’t want to keep you.”

She heard the toy say, “I’m not a toy you can keep. I am a woman.” She paid this no mind as she wound up and yeeted that old toy as far as she could throw it. She didn’t even hear it splat because of how far it was tossed.

Dusting off her hands, she fashioned the parachute into a makeshift bag and crawled over to her fashion dolls. They were starting to break up, so she patiently waited. As each doll passed the building that she was sitting behind, she snatched them up and gently placed them into her satchel after kissing their head.

Since she had counted her dolls before finding the parachute, she knew she had collected them all, but one more doll passed by. She quickly scooped up the coach dolly too. She knew her dollies would need their coach. Well, she would be their coach, but she needed someone to play her.

This dollie was beautiful and reminded her vaguely of her mommy. She had pretty curly brunette hair and a tight figure, except for the cutest of little belly. This dolly was wearing a black track suit. She was curious if she all had underwear on, as only fancy dollies did.

Pushing up her suit top, she found the dolly had a second shirt on. With some difficulty due to the doll squirming, she pushed up that shirt to see her doll was in fact wearing a red bra. It was soft and her breasts were squishy like her moms too.

Content with the bra for a moment, she smoothed down the dolls shirt. With her index finger, she hooked the front of the dolls pants and pulled down to inspect her underwear.

To her surprise, what she saw was a thick bush and the top of her vulva. It seemed to her that this dolly wasn’t wearing panties - although what really transpired is she hooked both garments with her nail.

By this point, the dolls horror had petrified it and she sat stiff in the girls hand. Gathering up her satchel and shoving her favorite coach dolly into her pocket, Anna set off to:

When the flash died down, Liz found herself seated one grass. She quickly whipped her head around to see she was no longer 3inches tall, but rather she was back where she started at 9ft. The amazon sighed in relief. She might not have been very happy about being an amazon again but anything was better than three inches.

It was then she realized something was missing. Or rather, someone. Where had the officer gone? He was holding her up just a second ago. She then hear what sounded like a high pitch squeaking sound coming from below. Looking down at her hand she saw what appeared to be the officer's uniform.

The only difference being he wasn't in it. Oh god! He touched the stone! Did it kill him!? Was he dead!? Her questions was soon answered when the high pitch squeaking returned, followed by a small lump moving within the discarded uniform. Liz looked at the bump with wide eyes as her 8 year old mind put two and two together.

It couldn't be.

Liz gulp nervously before leaning over the uniform. with a shaky hand she peeled back the shirt to reveal the 3inch nude form of officer Carter McDrake. Touching that glowing piece of metal had shrunk him down and grown her back. The roles had been unceremoniously reversed.

Not wanting to leave the now confused and sputtering officer in sea of his own clothing, Liz reached down and gently plucked him into her palm. The whole situation was bizarre. Never in her wildest dreams did she think she'd be holing a tiny person in the palm of her hand.

She was back to square one and now had unintentionally dragged someone else into her own mess. What did she do now?

Unfortunately for the still growing girl, her pleas would go unanswered. Fear of what they couldn't understand had overwritten the police's rationale. Instead the police continued their steadily difficult climb up her feet. The contact wasn't very pleasant and Liz quickly let them know it.

"I-I said stop!" The ow 200ft tall girl began to lift her enormous foot high and shake I t back and forth. The giantess still felt a minor itch by her feet and looked to see the police were shooting at her. That wasn't good. Cops only shot at bad people. She wasn't bad, was she? She honestly didn't know anymore. Tears began to prick the corners of her eyes. Without thinking, Liz began to run.

14432332421222.title: Liz runs into the woods

144323324212221.content:
Carter felt bad for the girl as she continued to cry. She never wanted this and yet somehow got it, He wanted to say something to make her feel better. To ease her suffering. He was a cop goddamn it, weren't they supposed to find a way to help people?

Before he could offer any words to sooth giantess, a familiar sound caught his ear. He honestly surprised he heard anything at all given the fact that the 305ft tall girl was still bawling her eyes out. Looking off in the distance with narrowed eyes he suddenly went pale.

It was chopper, scratch that, a sea of choppers. Military grade. Some even had tanks suspended below them by cables. "Oh no." he whispered. The army had been called in and judging by the vehicles and armaments they were packing, it wasn't to negotiate.

This was bad.

He had to warn Liz. "Liz!? Liz!? Snap out of it! The army's coming!"

She couldn't hear him, the 310ft girl was lost in her tears. She couldn't hear the attack choppers closing in. This was worse than Carter could have ever imagined. When he became a police officer he never expected something like this to happen. Just what had his life become?

A circus no doubt.

Carter shook his head. That didn't matter. He needed to find a way to resolve this situation before things escalated. The situation had already gone from bad to worse with the police. If the army started shooting then things would ascend to nuclear levels.

The cops' peashooters couldn't do a damn thing to Liz but some explosives might seriously hurt her. And if they don't what would happen then? She was still a child even if she didn't look the part. Would she run away again? Or would she finally snap and put her new size to use? Children were prone to tantrums after all. The thought of a giantess Liz consciously flattening innocent people sent chills up his spine.

"Liz!?" he called again.

No response.

"Crap!" Carter cursed. He turned his head to see the choppers dropping the tanks to the ground and the foot soldiers on were now on the move. He was out of time.

Why was this happening to him?

1443233242122211.title: The army opens fire (Liz is unharmed and finall...

14432332421222112.content:
"Damn it! We're loosing men too fast!"

"General sir!" A Private saluted.

The General turned to address her. "What is it, Spears!?"

The General was honestly in no mood to listen to subordinates at the moment. He'd been watching from a nearby hill as his men were being slaughtered by a 395ft tall giantess. This was a nightmare. All those men, what he tell their families? Their loved ones were crushed by a 395ft B-movie cosplayer?

His knuckles tightened.

Spears, knowing how her General was feeling decided to just get the news out there quick. "We've received a call from high command, sir."

"What kind of call?" The General asked curiously. His anger temporarily cooled off.

Spears gulped. "They said their sending over a specialist. A big city scientist who may know what the in the seven hells is going on around here."

The General scoffed. He didn't need any big wig scientist or pencil pushers here on the battlefield. They didn't belong... and yet, as he continued to watch his men get pulverized, he knew he had to swallow his pride. The General sighed. "When are they coming?"

"Ten minutes, Sir. Command will be sending re-enforcements as well." Spears answered.

"We don't have ten minutes!" The General practically shouted. The two were suddenly broken from their conversation by a loud boom. Looking back at the battlefield they could see a few of their tanks had exploded while Liz flattened them with her foot. There was no way in hell they'd last ten minutes.

"Oh god." Spears whispered.

The General mimicked her shock. "Spears!? We don't have five minutes. Call the local city and have them send every officer they have! It's an emergency!"

Spears hesitated for a second before nodding. "Yes Sir"

As the General watched his subordinate retreat to make the call, he reached into his pocket and pulled out a cigar he'd been saving. He wouldn't sit up on this hill any longer. He was going to the front lines with his troops. He un-holstered his pistol and charged to the battlefield.

"Today is a good day to die!"

144323324212221122.title: The police arrive and the army holds out for te...

choices: Liz is so big she accidently destroys anything she's near
The General, Private Spears, and Scientist P.O.V
1443233242122211221.content:
"I'm sorry... But I can't let a threat like her walk around free. When I became a soldier I swore to protect this country from all threats both foreign and domestic. She's already killed some of my men... And I don't intend to let that go." The General explained. "OPEN FIRE!" he screamed.

"NOOO!!!" the Scientist cried as he saw every officer and soldier preparing to fell the giant.

The world suddenly seemed to move in slow motion for the scientist. Every bullet, missile, and explosive began to move at a snail's pace. He couldn't believe what the General had ordered. While a part of him wanted to tear the man apart, the other part could understand. He was just doing what he thought was right...

...So now he would do what HE thought was right.

With the world moving like it was under water, the scientist reached into his coat and pulled out a silver pistol. It was small yet heavy, completely untested and good for maybe one or two uses. Despite the General's feelings this 490ft giantess was still a little girl and he wouldn't let the military or the law hurt her out of fear and revenge.

"Please let this be the right decision." he whispered.

He aimed the gun right between Liz's eyes... And fired. The laser was so quick that it zoomed past the fast approaching bullets as time began to speed up. Liz felt and odd sensation in her head before everything went back to normal. The last of the army's and law enforcement's ammo connected with the giantess in a huge explosion of death and fire.

"Thank god, it's over." the General said to himself. The other men on the front lines seemed to feel the same as a sense of relief washed over them. That was until an all too familiar booming voice filled their combined ears.

"I DON'T FEEL SO GOOD."

Everyone present visibly paled as the smoke died down and Liz stood unharmed. In fact she looked bigger, way bigger, and still growing, only this time at a more rapid and visible pace.

"OH. I'M GETTING BIGGER!" she panicked... And so did the ground forces.

"Oh my god." The General said in awe and terror. He leaned into his radio and yelled, "RETREAT!!!"

The officers and soldiers didn't need to be told twice as the ran for the hills or tried to drive away. Unfortunately they were just to close to the action. There was no way they could move in time as Liz's enormous feet barreled into them and crushed them flat.

The General's eyes widened at what he was seeing and hearing. The sounds of bending metal and the final screams of his allies, all defeated and buried by the massive toes and foot of a rapidly expanding giant. How could this have happened? Why was it happening?

Even the scientist's eyes were wide with fright. He wanted to save the girl but not at the expense of killing those involved with this operation. He felt ill as he looked down at his gun, he'd made a mistake.

"General!? General!?" a voice called. He looked off to the side to see Private Spears piloting a chopper. "Get your ass in here now!"

He hesitated for a moment as the screams finally went silent. It was only with the aid of the scientist that they made it to the chopper. The scientist strapped the now silent General in as Spears flew them away from the battlefield. "where are we going?" he asked.

"Anywhere but here!" was her only reply.

As they left Liz continued to explode in size. The world around just kept getting smaller and smaller, until finally Liz could take no more and shut her eyes. She could still feel her body growing and wondered if it would ever stop. If she would ever be normal again. eventually her body did come to a stop.

Down below, one soldier had miraculously survived. Blood loss would get him soon but what he saw on his back would be burned into his eyes forever. The giantess wasn't just tall now. She was damn near immeasurable. Clouds were swirling around her ankles for god's sake. His eyes widened with terror...

...And that expression stayed with him into the afterlife.

14432332421222112211.title: Liz is so big she accidently destroys anything ...

144323324212221122111.content:
Spears did her best to keep the chopper steady as she fought her inner turmoil. On the one hand she felt bad for the giant girl. She really did. She was obviously scared and wanted all this to end, but there just didn't seem to be any feasible way to end things peacefully.

On the other she couldn't completely fight off the contempt she now had for the girl. Even if she hadn't intended it, she had crushed her friends flat. Her brothers and sisters in arms were now merely red paste beneath her sole. And then there was the man she respected most... Her General, reduced to a mute. His noble spirit broken.

The Specialist command sent was completely useless. What did he contribute to this fight? A whole lot of nothing. He was better off sitting in a lab somewhere designing his little tinker toys. Spears bit her lip hard, why was all this happening to them. What had they done to be dealt such a bad hand?

While Private Spears was lost in her own head, the Scientist continued to look out the window at the "monster" he'd created. He felt ill, guilty. He'd turned an innocent and scared little-- er, big girl, into and even bigger girl. She had to be at least a little over 8 and a half miles tall.

He silently cursed himself for his actions. He only wanted to help protect the girl from the General's rash actions and fears, instead he'd just made things worse. He even made the girl cry. Looking away from her and back to the near comatose General... He was also reminded he'd broken the man and cost him his unit. His family. He might not have agreed, but the man was simply doing his job.

Looking away again he dug into his coat and pulled out he gun that caused this. This itty bitty gizmo he created was supposed to fix her. But then again it didn't have proper field testing. Honestly it was a 50/50 shot weapon that could go either way. It just so happened he had all the luck of his father when gambling. Why couldn't he take after his mother?

He had to fix this somehow. The gun had one shot left. Why not take another gamble. Tightening his hand around the grip, he turned towards Spears. "Hey!? Private! Get me in close!"

Spears looked at him as if he'd grown a second head. "Go back to the battlefield!? Are you insane!? Do you not see the size of that monster!? Just her breathing alone could kill us!"

"She's not a monster!" The Scientist snapped. "She's just a scared little girl who you all attacked!"

"How dare you! We were just following orders! My squad, my friends were just killed by that freak while sat around with your thumbs up your ass! Don't you blame us for what happened!" Spears snapped back.

The Scientist sighed. This wasn't going well. There was just too much bad blood over the situation. "Please. Just get me in close. I think I have a way to put an end to this."

"Oh really?" Spears rolled her eyes, not buying what he was selling.

"I'm serious! See this!?" he asked as he held up he gun. "It's an experimental size-ray. In theory it could change thie size of anything it hits."

"What!?"

"You heard me! Get me close and we can end this!"

The General muttered something under his breath, but it went unheard over the sound of the chopper. Against her better judgement, Spears agreed to move in. After all, what did they have to lose? Spears gulped as she circled the crying giantess. It took all her training and combat skills to avoid the falling tears if death. The sooner the nerd took the shot, the sooner this nightmare could end.

"Alright. This is as close as we can get!" Spears stated. "Take the shot."

The sooner she was away from this "monster" of a girl, the better.

The General muttered, slowly unbuckling himself.

The Scientist aimed the gun, unaware of the predator stalking him. Before he could pull the trigger, the General attacked. The Scientist was tackled to the ground as the gun fell from his hands. "Your fault!" he muttered over and over again like a disturbed mental patient.

The gun cracked as it collided with the floor and a beam shot forth. It struck the still crying Liz, and rather than shrink down as intended. The girl experienced another explosion of growth. "No! Please! No more!" she cried.

The General and Scientist fight spilled into the cockpit as Spears tried to keep the copper steady. Unfortunately for her the Scientist bumped her elbow causing them to spin out of control. The General was launched from the chopper and fell in between the abyss of Liz's rapidly growing toes.

Spears and the Scientist could only scream as they prepared for a crash landing.

McDrake smiled to himself as he watched the four inch girl tremble on his kitchen table. He could still hardly believe this wasn't a dream or some sort of twisted prank. This was real, and that meant he literally held this girl's life in the palm of his hand.

"Alright little Lizzy. Since I'm your best chance at survival and the only one who can protect you now, it only seems fair that I should be rewarded for my efforts."

"Rewarded?" Liz gulped. She had no idea what the giant officer meant by "rewarded", but it clearly wasn't good for her. What did he want from her anyway? At her size it wasn't like she could give him anything of value.

In all the years I've been an officer not once did anyone I rescue say thanks or even give me a little something. But that changes here and now, today. I saved you so as thanks you're going to amuse me."

Liz's trembling increased. "Amuse?''

McDrake's smiled widened. "Yep." He then proceeded to pull out his phone. He flipped through it for a while before placing it down. Liz wondered what he was up to until music started to play. What!? "Lizzy... I want you to dance for me."

Liz felt her eyes widen at the officer's request. He wanted her to dance? Naked!? The tiny girl could feel her cheeks heating up. She couldn't possibly. He couldn't be serious, could he? "B-but I...."

"No buts Lizzy. I saved you from the street. What would've happened if someone else who wasn't me found you. What if someone who didn't like you found you in your current state or a stay dog happened to stop by? The way I see it, you owe me. So start dancing."

The tiny girl could muster a reply to the officer's logic. She shudder to think about what would happen if her school bully Megan found her, or if a dog did stop by and mistook her for food. Every scenario her imagination cooked up was more terrifying than the last.

11 - year-old Emily is an extremely curious girl that loves to try new things and she is not afraid to take risks. Emily is stunningly gorgeous for her young age and she is a bit of an exhibitionist that experiments a lot with her sexuality. This sometimes gets her into trouble, especially when she goes outside all natural in order to see people's reactions to her. She has long, flowing long brown hair, and noticeable budding young breasts. She has slightly curvy hips, but no pubic hair as of yet. She has blue eyes.




On this sunny day, the blue-eyed beauty is bored, wondering what to do. It is summer break, so she is home alone. Her dad along with her 13 year old older brother Kevin will not be home for a few hours and her mom along with her 6 and 4 year old little sisters will not be home for another two days. As she wonders what to do, she sees the mail carrier dropping off their mail. She runs to the mailbox dressed in a thin pink dress and gets the mail. Character From A Little Girl:

Sarah (you): An eight year old girl who finds herself mysteriously reduced to a bit under an inch and a half tall.


Emma (prefers to be called Em): Sarah's identical twin sister. Both twins have brown hair and blue eyes, though Emma's comes down about two inches past her shoulders while Sarah's is about half as long.



Rachel: The twins' fourteen year old sister. Rachel has green eyes and blond hair that reaches about halfway down her back. Rachel isn't very nice, but as a general rule would not hurt her siblings.



Lauren: The girls' mother. She is 37, with short, dark hair and blue eyes. A loving mother, but absentminded: she rarely thinks things through before doing them.


Mark: Lauren's 38 year old husband. Mark is on a business trip for two weeks.


Kaylee: Sarah, Emma, and Rachel's four year old cousin. She has vivid blue eyes, thin, curly, blond hair, and is only halfway potty trained.

1531.content:
Lauren Adams was your average girl, not much special except being smart not prodigy smart but smart enough to land a junior internship at a local lab and research facility.


Lauren was 16 5"4 thin with brown hair blue eyes and small breasts.


On this day Lauren was home babysitting for her mother's friend , co-worker and neighbor Miss Andrews.


Both of them were at some work retreat thing for the weekend and it was summer break from school.


Lauren initially had hoped to have this day off but now she was babysitting baby Rai.


Soon Lauren got a call on her Cell it was the labs supervisor.


"Listen Lauren we are close to a breakthrough but 2 of our techs had to call off something about an accident on the freeway and mild concussions. Anyway since they lack dedication to the cause I need you down here now"



"I would love to Iris but I'm kind of babysitting my neighbors baby"


"I don't care if it's the freakin first lady's first born or the royal baby get here if you want a future career in this town. Project deadlines take top priority"


"What am I supposed to do with the baby?"


"If you have to bring the brat with you. We will arrange something for her"



With a sigh Lauren slumped away to prep.

***48 minutes later***


"Oh right you mentioned bringing a rugrat with you. Well Sue can handle it" said Lauren's boss. "Take the child and its toys to an empty lab we aren't using leave her snacks and a bottle and seal the door. The kid should be fine for a few hours or so"



The middle aged red head assistant did as she was told and soon found an old and fairly large lab room. It belonged to a previously fired scientist. The room seemed pretty empty aside from a few work tables, chairs , shelves on the walls and 2 small but empty bookcases.



The assistant sat Rai down with her toys
https://twitter.com/PKLewd2015/status/60...


Rai soon starts to play with her toy plane. The assistant sets down the diaper bag on a table and sets a bottle down a few feet from Rai.



The assistant then leaves locking several locks on the door to the lab.




Late Rai was getting quite enthusiastic playing with her plane shaking it around till she went overboard and threw it.

https://twitter.com/PKLewd2015/status/60...


The plane flew across the room and smacked into a shelf and fell to the floor. In the process something fell off of the shelf hitting the floor. It looked like some sort of toy gun but with a few knobs and buttons.



The device seemed to power up for 30 seconds then some kind of blue beam shot out and zapped Rai.



The energy of it seemed to surround the toddlers entire body. The beam must of felt good or tickled.


Rai clapped and giggled as she watched the gun zap her seemingly harmlessly. After about 45 seconds the gun stopped on its own.



Nothing seemed to happen to Rai. After a minute or 2 Rai began to crawl across the room crawling till she reached what to her child mind was the most interesting toy ever.



Rai grabbed the gun and turned a knob to 300. Neither the toddler nor anyone else would of course know the other settings it was on.


Rai's hands weren't big enough of course to hold the gun entirely so she unknowingly poked it until her finger pressed the fire button presumably added as a backup to the trigger.


As Rai held her finger on the firing button the same blue beam from earlier zapped her once more.


https://twitter.com/PKLewd2015/status/60...


Rai giggled again as the beam surrounded her and rather than clap she kept her finger on the firing button. After a few minutes of giggles she took her finger off the button. Still she seemed unharmed and unchanged.


Getting thirsty Rai turned around and crawled back over to her other toys where her bottle also was. She grabbed her bottle with 2 hands and began to take a drink.


Next...

1533311.content:
Anna was your average HS Freshman.
She was 14, kind of cute, with lower C cup breasts.
She had Black hair and green eyes.
She wore kind of a unique school uniform.



One day some classmates from school wanted to meet her in an odd place.
Unfortunately she had somehow gotten the information slightly wrong.
She had been informed the place in question was about a 35 to 45 Minute
hike from the nearest transit stop.


Unfortunately she missed a turn and wound up in a seemingly abandoned air base.
She went inside a larger hangar that had to be at least 100 feet tall.
Anna couldn’t imagine a need or use for a hanger so big.


She couldn’t make out some faded signs warning this was Government property.
Fortunately some politician made the poor choice to not only abandon the facility but eventually
slash security costs and maintenance funding.


Anna looked around.
Everything was dusty and there were things covered in tarps.
Anna stopped at a large looking laser.
It was dusty but yet probably the newest and most intact thing here.



Anna looked at it.
“What is this place? And what is this thing”


She wasn’t sure why she was compelled to look at it.
She dusted the thing off unaware that in the process she had bumped a button.
She turned and walked a few feet away unaware that the laser was coming to life.


“I wonder where everyone is and why they wanted to come here”

Anna then heard a humming of a machine.
She turned to face the laser device and had no time to react.
A huge bright blast fired.



Anna was caught off guard.
“Ahh what the?”
The flash of light faded however something began to happen.
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/97...

https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/97...

Anna felt strange.

“EHHH What’s happening? I feel very strange”

Then it happened in spurts. Her body starts to change clothes and all.
Anna slowly yet fast in phases began to shrink.


Anna couldn’t react much as brief shrinking phases hit.
After shrinking 7 times it stopped.


Anna was in awe and disbelief, as big as the hangar seemed before now it was massive.
Anna had been reduced to 1/15 her normal size or 3 3/4 inches tall.


At her new size she quickly became aware that the concrete floor she was now closer to gave off
a chill.

“W-what happened? How is this possible and why is is suddenly chilly?”


Before the shrunken teen could take things in or have more alone time with her thoughts there were some
loud crashing sounds and the ground shook with each one.


Unknown to Anna she had tripped an intruder alert before being shrunk.
