She then stopped her breakdown remembering Elly.


The girl was already bigger than her before all this started but now
Elly towered over her and it made Nagi feel worse in several ways.

Now the question was what happens next?
1533341112.title: Nagi gets shrunk

choices: Nagi returns to the jungle where she gets taunted by others
Time skip-Nagi on top of the food chain. Revisit and thank the humans! BIG SNAKE
1533341113.content:
Nagi had jumped into the air ready to pounce.
The beam struck Nagi and somehow held her in midair and mid jump/pounce.
It was enough for Elly to escape.


Finally still being zapped Nagi landed in a crumpled disheveled heap.
The machine however began to short circuit and spark.
It soon stopped.
Nagi didn’t see this tho.



As the strange energy stopped flowing thru her,
she got her bearings back.
Her sense of self preservation began to kick in.


“Curse you humans! I dunno what you did but you’re safe for now”
then for the time being Nagi slithered off as quick and quiet as she could
lest she deal with anymore of these humans pesky weapons.


Meanwhile Elly and the assistant notice the machine is now toast.


Nagi slithered off thankful to get away safely and
seemingly unaffected and unscathed.


Little did Nagi, Elly or the assistant know that
Nagi was in fact affected and she’d start having growth spurts.
1533341113.title: Nagi chased off for now. No effects yet.

choices: Humans and weapon gone! Looks like I get to stay big
Humans and weapons gone but I can’t stop growing
Thank the humans! Nagi is sincere! Spared on the condition of staying big
Foolish humans! Snacks and destroyed devices
Nagi too trusting! Shrinking down to size!
15333411134.content:
Nagi has slithered off back into new the forest
upset and embarrassed that her prey
had outsmarted her.


Sure humans often outsmarted naga’s
but for Nagi being the runt of the tribe and
litter it was worse.


Nagi wasn’t sure why but after that weapon
had struck her and she left she kept
feeling strange on occasion.


She ignored it though still being hungry
and managed to catch a deer and a bear
easier than normal for her.


Again she shrugged this off.
Nagi then snuck to her cave not
wanting to be seen or mocked by her
fellow naga.



The cave in question was of decent size
and the one that her mother and sister
had raised the blonde green eyed naga in
up until they abandoned her about 2 years
back saying that they were bestowing her
independence early but in truth it was
that she was an outcast that embarrassed and
shamed them both.


Nagi was a rare anonomoly among
naga-kin.
She developed physically slower.
Her chest was smaller than many.


Her size had held her back often in
catching prey other than what younger
naga could manage.
Lastly she was slightly more human and
less snake than many of her peers.


Nagi slithered into her cave and cried
herself to sleep over her shame, and
reliving some bad memories.



Hours later Nagi woke up feeling strange
yet good at the same time.
As she woke up something felt off?
She didn’t have much time to ponder though
as the ground seemed to be getting
further away?


Also was her cave home getting smaller?
The feelings and shifting view lasted
several minutes then stopped.


Nagi checked herself over after wiping the
sleep from her eyes.
Everything seemed the same.
Nagi was still blonde, still a naga,
and still had her disappointingly small
B cup breasts.


Nagi slithered a few inches forward
then stopped.

Things were definitely different and
not right.

Why was the ceiling of her cave suddenly
within arms reach?
Why if she only slithered a few inches
was the entrance to her cave suddenly
closer to her bed?


Speaking of her bed where was it?
And why did her blanket stolen by her
sister from camping humans sudden seem
no bigger than a small towel?


Nagi slithered around a little more and
found her makeshift bed was crushed to
pieces.


Finally she slithered out of the cave.
1st thing she noticed was fewer animals
outside her cave and no Naga’s around.
This seemed strange until she noticed
something else.


Just like in her cave everything seemed
smaller... much smaller.
Then it clicked.

“D-di-did I finally somehow get bigger?”

Nagi pondered this for a moment then
thought back on her experiences.

“That human thing! It musta made me
bigger somehow! This is a dream come true”


Just then she caught a naga who was
slithering by. The now 90 feet tall naga
grabbed the naga who was male and
panicked.


Nagi recognizes him. He was one of
only 3 males in their large tribes and
even more of a rarity than she was.

He was also one of the ones who had
picked on her most even having
messed with her food a few times or
ruined some captures.


The normal and now doll sized to her
naga struggled a bit.

“No please miss alpha I’m sorry I crossed
into your territory don’t hurt me”


Oh how the tables had turned and Nagi
admitted she could get used to this.


“Well well if it isn’t Nageo”

The male naga stopped a moment
recognizing the voice.

“Wait that voice?”

He looked at her.

“Oh my gosh Nagi is that you?
N-no way how can this be?
How did you become a macroga and
an alpha?”


Nagi had been so wrapped up in
her thoughts and glee it had slipped her
mind.

“Wait alpha? I knew I had an advantage now
but what do you mean alpha?”


Nageo briefly forgot his situation.

“Nagi you dunce don’t you get it?
It’s why there’s few animals and practically
no naga around.
Whatever happened to you changed
more than you think.
Your scent and your pheromones changed.
It’s why I was fleeing.


Y-you have then scent of an alpha now
and though it pains me to admit
attraction pheromones too”


Nagi paused to think.
It made a certain kind of sense.
After all she rose up the food chain.


If all of this was true then she was
not only near the top of the food chain
but that she had reached maturity for a naga.
In other words her body was ready for
a mate in her case typically an alpha willing
to submit to her or someone human or naga
she’d force into it.


Right now though that didn’t matter.
She turned her attention back
to the male naga she was holding.


“So uhh Nagi like I asked how did this
happen to you and would you mind letting me go?”


Nagi grinned.
“I’m afraid that’s my little secret shrimp.
Besides that no longer concerns you or
your friend”

Nagi quickly reached behind a bush
with her free hand and grabbed another
male naga named Hunter.


“Nagi please I’m sorry every mean thing
we did was always Nageo’s idea”


“Hunter you traitor”

“Boys boys no need to fight or struggle.
You see it doesn’t matter.
What does matter is I’m an alpha and
I’m a little hungry.”


Both naga went pale.

“Please no! Spare me! You can eat
Nageo! I’ll even help you catch the others”


“Hunter you bastard!”


“I have a better idea boys”


It happened super fast but in seconds both
boys were swallowed.

“Now then I believe I have a date with
some humans to thank them”


Nagi then slithers off not minding that
most life in the forest is giving her a wide
berth out of fear and self preservation.

15333411142.content:
When Nagi had came down from her pouncing attack, she hit a warm fleshy wall that was a few feet above the ground. Since she had been stopped earlier than expected, Nagi’s landing was less than graceful leaving her in a heap. Once she regained her composure she glanced about and suddenly came face to face with Elly, who was leaning agains the wall.

Elly had closed her eyes when Nagi had pounced and was only just now opening her eyes. She was somewhat confused when she saw the blonde naga resting on hr stomach looking much smaller. Nagi and Elly’s eyes met for a moment both looking a little confused, though Nagi looked quite fearful as well. Elly quickly grabbed Nagi and went to sit up straight, only to hit her head on the ceiling. She lossend her grip on Nagi out of shock, quickly looking around to see that she had grown quite a bit. trying to figure out what had happened she noticed the reader had assitant standing by the laser with a shocked expression on his face.

“Was that laser what made me grow?” Elly asked. The research assistant breifly looked back and forth between her and the laser and somewhat slowly noded. “Do you think you can shrink me back down?” The research assitant looked at the control panel before giving a shaky thumbs up.

Elly closed her eyes as the research assitant fiddled wiht the contorl panel, all the while ago was wriggling around trygin to escape Elly’s lossend grip.
15333411142.title: Nagi hits a soft warm wall? Elly Enlarged!

Liz wakes up having outgrown her clothes
Last nights misfire, todays misfortune! BIG BEN The 2 yr old giant Liz created
Last nights misfire, todays misfortune! Patty the Preschool Giant!
15333414.content:
Liz is an average height 7 year
old at just under 3 1/2 feet tall,
on her way home from school,
she had a bad day because the boys
were all bullying her for being too
quiet, even the teachers had a tendency
to get spooked by her, due to her meek nature.



Right around the corner from her house
she noticed something lodged into
the hedges at her neighbors, it was a small
device that wasn't too dissimilar to a water pistol,
but when she picked it up it definitely
weighed more than one.


There was a switch on the side like a small
toggle reading (R) and (E), and it was
currently set to (R) there was also a knob
that ranged from 10-300, but it had been
pushed past the 300 mark and seemingly
broken there in place.



Liz was investigating the weird device.
She played with the toggles a few times, and
when she tried to use the knob the device
began to become very hot and Liz dropped
it on the ground, as it hit the ground it
emitted a bright green flash that
blinded Liz for a minute.



She looked around and saw that nobody had
seen her touch the device and she
could just walk home.
She picked up the device and headed home.
Her evening went uneventful however the next
day_____

One day a high school jock

15532.title: Multiple jocks find it

choices: Play with it now here at the park
155321.content:
To prove it works they test it out on
Their football coach’s car with him inside.


"You gonna do it?" Johnny asked with anticipation.

"Hang on," Derek said as he lifted up the shrink ray, trying to hold it at an angle where the Coach would not see it coming from him.

"Annnnnd....now!" Derek said pulling the trigger of the remote.

The two pals watched with smiles ear to ear as their coach's car seemed to vanish from sight. The gas guzzling SUV had been reduced to the size of a Hot Wheels Car, as did its cargo and passengers. The two buds broke into laughter as they saw the tiny vehicle swerve and slam on the breaks. Tom must've been panicking.



Inside the car, poor Tom had no idea what had happened. He had gone from driving his car in the school parking lot to now driving across a seemingly endless asphalt plain. The only thing is that there massive tires supporting giant cars everywhere. It did not take Tom McCormack very long to realize what had happened. Somehow he had been reduced in size. His car now resembled a matchbox car, a child's toy.



Unfortunately, the seemingly harmless prank Derek and Johnny had just pulled off was about to have some unintended consequences. Unbeknownst the the boys, Coach McCormack was not actually headed home to his house just yet. In reality, he was simply pulling up a couple dozen parking spaces to the children's playground right next to the football field where he held practice.



At this park was his 4 -year-old daughter
Cindy, she was playing at the park today while
her dad was coaching, and he was just pulling
up to let her know it was time to go home.



Derek and Johnny watched as a young girl started obliviously wandering into the path of the tiny car.




“Daddy?" the 4 year old girl called out.
Johnny and Derek instantly recognized the
problem with this situation.



They also recognized Cindy and realized
she was looking for Tom.


Tom was getting a terrifying close up view of his daughter. His "little girl" was getting way to close to him.
She wore sandals and her socks seemed to
now be missing.



Her feet could easily demolish his vehicle,
let alone his soft, squishy body.



“Daddy? Where are you?" she calls out again, her voice rattling her miniature father. She continued walking in the direct path of her father's car.


Cindy stepped closer and closer to her father's car. Poor Tom was at an absolute loss, he had no idea how to handle a situation like this. He could only watch in terror as his precious "little girl" rested one massive foot on each size of his car.


"WHAT'S THIS?" Cindy said. Tom looked on in astonishment as his daughter's giant fingers wrapped around him and his now hot-wheel sized vehicle.


“Ooo Toy car! It looks just like daddy’s”


Cindy lifted the tiny toy SUV up and examined it. It looked very much like her dad's car, there was even a toy figurine in the driver's seat.


“CINDY please it's me! Your father!" Tom yelled in futility inside of his car.


Just then it dawned on Tom. He began honking the horn like crazy, hoping his giantess of a daughter would notice. It seemed to work as Cindy lifted the car closer to her face.

"That's cute," she giggled and lowered the car back down to her side.

She began walking off with her prize when she decided to do what?
155321.title: Their football coach’s car with inside -shrink-

choices: Collosal Cindy trying to find someone she knows
Tom following his not so little girl
1553211.content:
Cindy walked back to the playground, tossing the car up and down in her hand. Unbeknownst to her, this was causing her tiny dad, Tom, the absolute worst motion sickness he had ever experienced. Tom was getting light headed and doing all he could not to vomit.



The 4 year old was oblivious to her fathers plight.



Derek and Johnny did not want to abandon their coach, as they were the reason he was in this situation. Derek felt confident that if they waited, they would get their chance to grow Tom back.



Johnny, who was not experienced with the shrink ray, was much more anxious. He felt that he was the reason their coach's life was in danger. Not thinking clearly, Johnny snatched the shrink ray out of Derek's hands.




"Hey what the hell are you doing?" Derek said in a panic, as he saw Johnny aiming the shrink ray at
Cindy playing with the car.



"Wait don't," was all he managed to get
out as Johnny pulled the trigger.


Inside the car, Tom was on the verge of a breakdown. He was absolutely terrified at the thought of what his daughter could do to him, and had no idea how to get her attention. Then there was a bright flash that temporarily blinded both him and Cindy. When his vision was restored, he was unaware that anything had changed. He was still in the car being held by his daughter. Then he looked out the window.



Everything seemed to be back to normal, the school, parking lot and playground appeared to be normal sized. Then it dawned on him what had happened, he had somehow returned to normal, but his
4 -year-old daughter Cindy was now a giant.


Cindy was dazed and confused and her young
mind couldn’t fully grasp what happened.
She dropped her fathers car which somehow landed
safely in a vacant spot minus Tom’s sore butt and
the loss of the suspension.


Johnny had inadvertently dropped the gun
as he and Derek looked in awe.
Cindy’s bare feet had outgrown and snapped
her sandals fortunately the rest of her clothes
grew with her.


This was evident as the jocks had an
unintentional view up her blue skirt of
peach colored panties.


The big toe in front of them moved and they
heard an audible “CRUNCH”


Their eyes bugged out seeing the size ray
now in dozens of flattened pieces.


Cindy finally came out of her daze.
She was still confused and oblivious though.


“W-what happened” she said in a frightened tone
her voice clearly the same cute voice but amplified.
“W-where am I”


She looked around and took a step back.
She accidentally crushed a car.


“Oh no I crushed someone’s toy”


She picked up the car which fortunately wasn’t
Tom’s.
She inspected it.


“I’m so sorry I didn’t mean to break you!
I hope someone can fix you”


She sat the car back down and looked around
again.

Cindy was unaware that she was now
330 feet tall or roughly 100x her normal size
give or take.


Tom was in awe and disbelief.
He watched as his "little girl" stomped off.
Her feet leaving crater like footprints
and shaking the ground a bit.
He knew he had to get to her, she could get out of control or get hurt. He took off after her trying to protect his daughter.

Who do you follow next?

15533.title: More choices/something else

155334.content:
How’s about
Based on an interactive that’s just a
revival or retelling of an old interactive
———————

The premise is about a device called
“The Matter Transponder”
Basically a glorified size device

——————-
Let's just say you weren't exactly invited to the science lab at this early hour of the day, but here you are amongst the various tables of equipment and chemicals. You walk on silent toes while perspiration pools in your pores. You're unsure how many people could be in the building already. There were only a handful of cars in the parking lot when you pulled in, but that could easily have increased to pockets full by now.

You know what you are looking for; you've only been following its theory and progress for months on years under Professor Montana. Miss Rebekah Montana, one of the youngest, brightest physics professors in the country, just twenty-five years old, devoted countless hours and years to this project, and you were always thrilled to overhear any information about it. The unbelievable "matter transposer", a device that could alter the size of any object or person it contacted should be here, in this very college laboratory. Through your piecing together of the puzzle, the physics of the invention remained unclear, but every partial hint gave the suggestion that it is real and that it will work. And there it is!

Resembling sketches the professor failed to hide from your observant inspections, the matter transposer rests on a nearby lab table like any other ordinary piece of equipment. How could she leave such a wonder exposed like this! Good fortune or fate, it waits for you, calling you forward. You stand a moment in awe of what the oddly small device could do. Any of your fantasies could be transferred to reality with this simple, size-changing machine.

The matter transposer presents itself as a compact, silvery cylinder with several lights and a miniature display. A round dial gives the impression of controlling the power and direction, while a short handle and trigger creates a pistol-like form factor. You take it into your hands.

1553341.title: Transposer ( basically size ray device )

15533411.content:
With the transposer firmly in hand, you point it at different objects in the room but don't pull the trigger. You glance over the device's parts once again and twist the knob towards what you expect is growth then back towards shrink. An uncertain apprehension stirs inside as you struggle to decide how to manage this first test. The brief clues you've picked up on left you without proof of the matter transposer's actual strength.

You leave the dial slightly towards the reduction setting and aim at a scale on an adjacent table. As you pull the trigger, a slight hum vibrates through the device before a wave of light ripples through the air, engulfing the instrument on contact. The scale is aglow, swallowed by light as a radiant silhouette against the ordinary tabletop, then instant as a switch, the light flicks off and the scale is left half its former size.

"Incredible," the only word your awed breath can whisper as you approach the miniature scale. You reach out to it with tingling fingers and eyes wide with excited anticipation. You press the tiny button to activate it, and the lights come on with a cheerful beep. "And it still works!" An immeasurable smile crosses your cheeks, and you grip the matter transposer confidently. "Time to test this for real."
15533411.title: Test it here

155334111.content:
"OK, here goes nothing," you mutter to yourself.
The moment of truth.
Will this crazy thing actually work.


You adjust the dial one last time and press it
to your chest. You fire. You wince. You black out.



You come to. You stare around the large room
for a moment, unsure of where you are.
Hey! It worked! You're - wow, you're tiny.
You measure yourself on a convenient ruler:
3 inches tall.
OK, it works. Time to get back to size
and get out into the world with this thing.



You turn it back on your chest and
pull the trigger and are rewarded by a
series of beeps. What the hell?
Wait, what's that text scrolling across the LED?
Time to reset... 5 minutes. Well, damn.
There must be an automatic anti-heating
device built in. Well, no problem.
You can wait another 5 minutes, right?



Much to your dismay, as you are still right
out in the open, the doorknob turns
and the now huge door begins to open furtively.
You see your first giant.



You duck under the teachers desk.
You look out from your hiding place and
see the biggest shoe you've ever seen
right in front of you.
You carefully peek out more to see whose
foot it is. Looking up from your position you
see it’s a girl.


It’s _______________

You can see it’s a girl and you can

“Little girl” is huge to you.
She stands there in a pink shirt and

She taps her bare foot on the floor.
Sounding loud to you.

“Wow mommy’s lab looks weird”

Just then the Transposer signals to you
that it’s charged.



The girl believes she heard something.
You know you’ll have some explaining
to do but staying this size around a child
could be dangerous.



Scott ( You )
Adjusts the dials on the Transposer.
He takes aim and fires.
He’s oblivious that he’s been spotted.



Time seemed to happen in slow mo
as you fire and a giant hand grabs you.


Time resumes normal as the Transposer
created a flash.
Initially Scott was enveloped in the
energy of the blast but then it spread
to his new captor.


There’s noises and then moments later
the light fades.
At first Scott thought he was still
small but then it hits him.


The Transposer worked except too well.
You had turned this child into a 60 foot giant.
Fortunately her panties and shirt had grown
with her.


The girl recovered from the flash.
Her grip still had Scott, his arms and the
temporarily useless Transposer pinned
in her surprisingly strong grip.


She looked at Scott then spoke only
about 2 times louder than her normal sized
voice.


“What was that? And what’s with this
weird dolly?”


Scott knew he had to speak.

“Hey kid I’m not a doll”


She blinks and looks at Scott.
“Hey this doll talks”


“I’m not a doll”

“So mister Dolly do you have a
name and can you tell me what
happened? I feel different”


Scott sighs.
“My name is Scott, what’s yours”


“My name is Lily Montana and
I’ll be 5 years old in 3 months”

155334313344.title: Keep the choices comin’

1553343134.content:
Miss Rebekah Montana, one of the
youngest, brightest physics professors
in the country, just twenty-five years old, devoted countless hours and years to this project.


The Matter Transposer.
A fascinating yet complex device that
could shrink or enlarge things.
Rebekah had gotten the device to the
testing stages and was trying to work
out some kinks.


Currently she had shrunk herself
to just inches tall fortunately the Transposer
had shrunk with her.
Unfortunately fate and luck would soon
change the tides.


1 of Rebekah’s students
Rik Anderson came to seek her help.
He wasn’t alone as he entered her lab.


Rik had a toddler with him
a 3 year old blonde boy named Jake.
He was babysitting the boy.


Rik sat Jake down.
Rik looked around.

“Odd she doesn’t seem to be here”


Jake meanwhile had walked over to where
Rebekah was.
She was about to reenlarge herself when
Jake spotted her.


“Ooo toy”

The world seemed to go in slow-mo
as Jake grabbed the hand Rebekah was
holding the Transposer with.
The trigger was pulled and an image
flashed in her mind.

https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/11...

The Transposer went off with a flash.
Both Rebekah and Jake bombarded with
it’s energy.


Rik looked to see a blinding flash
and heard noises worried about Jake.

As the flash died down there sat
Rebekah now normal sized.


The flash still lighting up the room though
as it fades Rebekah notices the
Transposer on the floor still tiny and now broken.

It sparks a bit then the last of the blinding light
fades.
Now only one other question remains
as Rik tends to a worried looking
Professor Rebekah Montana.


Jake_____

155334313411.content:
Jake seemed unaffected thankfully.
Jake looked at Rebekah and giggled.

“Toy tickle! Toy big? Jake Big?”

Rik walked over and picked him up.

“Sorry but the professor isn’t a toy
little guy and you’re still the same” said Rik.


Rebekah looked at Jake with concern
hoping the toddler was truly unaffected and
that the flaws in the Transposer wouldn’t
be an issue.


It was bad enough that rebuilding the
Transposer would take a fair bit of time.
This wasn’t a great start to the morning.


A couple hours later Rik returned distressed.

“Professor we have a problem”

“Yes what is it? I was in the middle of
planning to rebuild my.....


She was cut off when a familiar toddler
walked into the lab only there was one big
difference.
Jake was now 10 feet tall.

“This is the problem professor.
Can you help”

“Jake big?” He questioned.

“Oh dear I was afraid of this”


“Afraid of what professor? How did this happen?
And can we fix Jake before his parents find
out or worse?”


“The Transposer, a device I was working on
it affected him earlier. Worse it may still
be affecting him”


“What do you mean?”


“I’ll explain but we gotta take some stuff
and get him outta here”



They round up some stuff and lead Jake
to the professors home which is surprisingly big.
Apparently inheritance from family.


They get Jake in the backyard just in time.
Jake begins acting strange and his body
trembles a bit.


“Feel weird! Jake big?”

He said before right in front of them he
began to grow diaper and all.
In all of 90 seconds Jake had swelled to
2x his size now standing 20 feet tall.


Jake looked around and giggling spoke.

“Big? Big Jake! Jake Big?”
He began clapping his hands
clearly thinking this was a game and enjoying
it unaware of the gravity of the situation.


“Big! Big! Jake Big! Big big! Big Jake
Big good! Big big”


Fortunately for now all he was doing was
clapping and enjoying his situation.
Also fortunately the professors estate
was away from other houses and had
40 foot walls, with 40 feet or taller
trees lining it and 2 high fences.


Rebekah explained her eccentric aunt
had valued privacy and hoped that
should Jake get bored with his celebration that
the yard, wall, trees, and fences would keep
him in for now.


“So explain things more professor”


“Well the Matter Transposer is a device that
can alter size as you can see.
When you both came in this morning I
was testing it.
I knew it works but it still has flaws”


“Flaws? What sort of flaws”


“Well there’s a stability issue.
I haven’t tested Enlarging anything or
anyone past normal size but Jake’s
condition kind of confirms my fears and hypothesis”


“What fears?”


“The shrinking function... it had a flaw
The person shrunk didn’t just shrink
They kept shrinking in spurts!
I suspected the growth may have the same
flaw”


“Wait you don’t mean...

“I do! If the reduction function did similar
then I fear Jake is going to keep growing
until cured or killed”


This time Rik and Rebekah both pictured
the same image
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/11...

Then picture Jake growing even bigger
than the image in their minds.
Both turned pale.


“I have to rebuild the Transposer since
Jake accidentally broke it earlier
I only hope I can do it before he gets too
big or causes problems”


They look over at the 20 Foot Jake.


“Big big! Jake big! Big! Big Jake! Big good!”


He was still in his own world for now fortunately.

try and minimize damage and contain
The growing Mega Melanie

info.brief_description: Where there's a Size Ray there's adventure and mishaps waiting to be had!
info.description:
Based off of and inspired in part by several stories including:

http://www.writing.com/view/1986056
http://www.writing.com/view/1693289
http://www.writing.com/view/1968860

And
http://www.writing.com/view/1532741

So someone finds , disposes of or invents a Size Changing Ray

The Ray can grow or shrink anyone or anything just about. The Ray can also Age Regress or Age Progress

The Ray may or may not enlarge clothing too. Your choice! The Gun also has various control settings.

The Ray can do delayed, slow, medium or steady shrinking growth or aging/de-aging not instantaneous crazy fast though please.

Also there are power settings of 10% 25% 50% 75% 80% 90% 95% 100% 150% 200% and 300%

Also Growth Shrinking etc may be 1 time per shot or continuous

Rules:
1: Limit growing males to ages 4 or under please so as to avoid getting into excessive mention of certain body parts

2: Female Growth is preferred but please don't go overboard with breast sizes and growth or certain body parts. Keep growth reasonably even

3: Shrinking males and females are allowed

4: Aging/De-Aging is allowed for either gender though I'd prefer not Aging males

5: Aging is restricted to not growring older than 21 De-Aging Restricted to Crawling age no newborns unbirth etc and no using the device on anyone that young


6: Characters can be ANY Ages but the target for the Ray can only be between crawling. Age and 24 please unless you are de-aging someone

7: no scat toilet stuff etc.

8: Rules subject to change as is rating. I reserve the right to edit or delete chapters for any number of reasons.

9: ( New as of 1/12/18 ) Please NO Furry , Animals, Characters from Sonic or the like. The most I’ll allow are neko/catgirls
wolf girls, mouse girls, dog girls, mermaids, or rabbit girls providing they are mostly human in appearance and ARE NOT FULL ON Animals, furs or fur covered!! There’s options for sonic and such elsewhere please and thanks


Possible Gift Points ( site currency ) for good chapter adds
